loans.name: Rema

texts.en: Rema, 39, is responsible for her family. She patiently sells Avon products plus operates her piggery business. Her husband works as a farmer in the village. They both work hard to support their needs. Rema said that she will do everything to lift her family out of poverty, and that is why she is also engaged in two kinds of businesses. Rema is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase Avon products such as makeup and underwear and feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs. She hopes that she can get the amount she has requested to further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase Avon products such as makeup and underwear and to purchase feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
Lucy es una mujer de  36 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposo y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar Lucy no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta limpiar su vivienda y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Picadillo de Paiche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Lucy trabaja brindando servicios de afiliado de discos de aserrar, adicionalmente alquila una mototaxi a diversos choferes para que brinden servicios de transporte, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Lucy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de madera, clavos, calaminas y pintura, ya que al acercarse la época de lluvia desea hacer el mejoramiento de su vivienda, de esta manera podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Lucy is a 36-year-old woman who lives in the city of Pucallpa with her husband and their three children. She loves her family dearly and they are her main reason for living. Lucy is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person. She and her husband dedicate all of their efforts to helping their family get ahead. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work, Lucy was not able to pursue a professional management degree as she would have liked. In her free time, she enjoys cleaning her house. On a few occasions, she prepares a delicious dish of “picadillo de paiche” (a minced fish stew) to share with her family.

Through her own initiative and with great effort and dedication, Lucy offers services by filing saw blades. She also rents out a motorcycle taxi to different drivers who provide transportation services. Lucy begins her day in the early morning hours and is able to work approximately 10 hours each day. She enjoys her work and believes she is doing well because of her efforts and the friendly treatment she provides to her customers.

Lucy is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she will be able to buy wood, nails, corrugated iron sheets, and paint. Since the rainy season is approaching, she would like to make improvements to her home so that she can provide more security and greater well-being for her family. Lucy will continue working and striving to achieve her greatest wish of seeing her children become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Trinidad Teresa

texts.es:
Trinidad Teresa tiene 50 años de edad de estado civil actual soltera tiene cuatro hijos, vive con los hijos en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Trinidad Teresa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandu, además se dedica a la críanza de cerdos y pollos. Las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. 

Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos, urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, líquido mata maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos. El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas cómo el cogollero, el ratón que dañan los cultivos. El sueño es  comprar terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Trinidad Teresa is 50 years old, single, and has four children. She lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Sentiment) is located in the neighborhood of Caimito II in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of the Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Trinidad Teresa is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. In addition, she raises pigs and chickens. Her purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. Trinidad is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, farming supplies, urea, weed killer, and fertilizers. This loan will be very helpful because she can buy these supplies without any problems. The challenges she faces include dealing with pests, such as army worms (a type of caterpillar that feeds on corn). Her dream is to buy a plot of land.

In her free time, Trinidad Teresa enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farming supplies, urea, weed killer, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Dina

texts.en: Dina, 25, is married and has two children. She operates a sari-sari store as a source of income, while her husband is in farming. She tried to learn this work because of the poor living they had been experiencing. It hurts her to see her children suffering from poor living. Now, she is asking for PHP 5,000 to purchase cooking oil, canned goods, noodles, and sugar. She hopes that through these goods, she could provide a better living for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, canned goods, noodles, and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and a stove.

loans.name: Jessica Consuelo

texts.es:
Jessica Consuelo tiene 34 años de edad es separada tiene cinco hijos, vive con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Jessica Consuelo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas.
 
Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, urea, insecticidas, ranger, líquido mata maleza. para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación es muy buena, en el trabajo ha aumentado la producción, los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. 

El sueño es cumplir con todas las metas. En elt iempo libre le gusta jugar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Jessica Consuelo is 34 years old, separated from her spouse, and has five children. She lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Sentiment) is located in the neighborhood of Caimito II in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of the Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Jessica Consuelo is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. Her purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. Jessica is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, urea, insecticides, Ranger (a brand of herbicide), and liquid weed killer so that she can keep her crops in good condition.

With her previous loan, she was able to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, weed killer, fertilizers, and poisons so that she could maintain the excellent condition of her crops. Her family is doing well and she has been able to increase production as a result of her work. Jessica’s income has improved greatly because she is able to generate more revenue through the sale of her products.

Her dream is to accomplish all of her goals. In her free time, Jessica Consuelo enjoys playing with her children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, insecticides, herbicide, and liquid weed killer.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Розе 54 года, вдова, имеет 5 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Роза занимается животноводством. Начатое 20 лет назад с 10,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Розы имеется 2 дойные коровы, 2 бычка, 1 лошадь и 10 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Роза обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Роза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Roza is 54 years old, widowed, and has 5 children. To provide a source of income for her family, she raises livestock. Roza's business, started 20 years ago with 10,000 som (KGS), presently earns around 5,000 som (KGS) per month. Currently, she keeps 2 dairy cows, 2 bulls, 1 horse and 10 sheep.

In order to continue developing her business, Roza has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy additional livestock. She plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Las Brisas Cienega Group

texts.es:
La señora Faustina Dominga  esta casada, tiene 26 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar en una escuela, tiene 2 hijos pequeños, se dedica a la confección de blusa y al comercio, inicio este trabajo siendo operaria e inicio su propio negocio con un poco de capital, gracias a al esfuerzo que ha hecho lleva 7 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien también se dedica a la confección de blusas.

Solicita un préstamo que sera invertido para la compra de telas e hilos para la confección de blusas típicas, las cuales tienen demanda en cu comunidad, en el futuro espera tener un negocio posicionado y con trabajadores.
texts.en:
Faustina Dominga is 26 years old and married.  She did not have the opportunity to study at school.  She has two young children and makes blouses and has a business.  She started in this trade as a machinist and started her own business with a little capital.  Thanks to her effort, she now has seven years experience and receives support from her husband who also makes blouses.

Faustina is applying for this loan to buy materials and threads to make typical blouses, which are in demand in the community.  In the future she hopes to have a well-established business with its own workers..

loans.use: to buy materials for dressmaking.

loans.name: Tat'yana

texts.ru:
Татьяна  -  женщина фермер.  С 2004 года занимается выращиванием огурцов и помидоров.
Справляться по хозяйству ей помогает муж и 13 -ти летний  сын, который учится в школе.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с выращивания молодых огурцов.
Татьяна с мужем решила приобрести пленку для перекрытия теплицы, агроволокно  для защиты от морозов и ветров в зимний период.
В планах на будущее:  поставить еще две теплицы, посадить виноград.
В личных планах: построить новый дом.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки и агроволокна.
texts.en:
Tat'yana is a farmer. Since 2004, she has been cultivating cucumbers and tomatoes. In her business, Tat'yana is assisted by her husband and her 13-year-old son who currently attends high school. Tat'yana started her farm by growing small cucumbers.

Tat'yana and her husband have decided to buy plastic film to re-cover their greenhouse, and special spunbond fabric to protect their plants from frost and wind during winter. Their future plans include constructing two additional greenhouses and planting grape vines. The family would also like to build a new house. Presently, they need your help to finance the purchase of plastic film and spunbond fabric.

loans.use: to purchase greenhouse covering and special material to protect plants from frost

loans.name: Marites

texts.en: Marites is 31 years old. She is married, blessed with two children and currently resides at Buguey where she manages a little store. She is earning PHP 200 each day, which she is using for their daily commodities. She is aiming for a higher income in order to save for the educational needs of her children. To make her business more gainful, she is requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase biscuits, breads, salt, milk, sugar and beverages. Hopefully, the loan will be a great help in improving her business.

loans.use: to purchase biscuits, breads, salt, milk, sugar and beverages

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en: Mary Ann is 23 years old, married and has one child. She is raising hogs to sell as her source of income and her husband is a farmer. Now, Marry Ann has insufficient funds to sustain the needs of her hogs. She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy feed, vitamins and medicines for hogs. Hopefully, after five months, she will offer her hogs for sale at a higher cost for additional profits.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and medicines for hogs

loans.name: Mila

texts.en: Mila is 33 years old. She plants/vends vegetables as a source of income. She has two children. Because of that, she needs to work more for their necessities. She has been in this business for more than 10 years. To slowly overcome poverty, she is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy seeds for plants such as eggplant and string beans to plant in her small planting area. She hopes that she soon improves their poor living conditions through the help of her loan requests.

loans.use: to buy seeds for eggplant and string beans

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
La Sra. Bertha es una mujer muy valiosa, ella es madre de 3 hijos, vive con sus hijas a las cuales ama con todo su corazón y le enseña valores cristianos para que sean unas buenas personas. Bertha se define como una mujer amable, trabajadora y responsable, con muchas ganas de salir adelante y de buscar un mejor bienestar para su familia.
El crédito que la Sra. Bertha solicito a FODEMI, se lo va a invertir  en la compra de máscaras de personajes, juguetes, artículos para el hogar, para vender en su local, ubicado en el centro de la ciudad. Ya que su clientela ha ido creciendo y necesita realizar esta inversión para seguir creciendo como microempresaria.
El sueño que la Sra. Bertha tiene es el construir su propia, para vivir junto a sus hijas, y darles una buena educación para puedan salir adelante y sean independiente, Bertha sigue trabajando arduamente para poder hacer su sueño realidad.
texts.en:
Sra. Bertha is a valiant woman who is the mother of three children. She lives with her daughters and loves them with her whole heart. Bertha teaches her children Christian values so that they will become good people. She defines herself as a friendly, hardworking, and responsible woman who has the drive to succeed and provide a better life for her family.

The loan that Sra. Bertha is requesting from FODEMI will be invested in the purchase of character masks, toys, and household items that she can sell from her shop that is located in the central part of the city. Her clientele is increasing, so she needs to make this investment in order to continue growing as a micro-entrepreneur.

Sra. Bertha’s dream is to build a house of her own where she can live with her daughters. She also wants to provide them a good education so that they can move forward and become independent. Bertha continues to work hard so that she can make her dream become a reality.

loans.use: to buy masks, toys, and household goods to sell.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en: Betty, 43, is engaged in fish selling as a source of income. She earns about PHP 200 per selling day. This is minimal, which is why she also put up a piggery business as an additional source of income. She wishes to improve the status of living for her family. Right now, she is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy fish plus feed and vitamins for her hogs. She hopes that her loan requests will be approved in order to obtain her dream.

loans.use: to buy fish, feed and vitamins

loans.name: Al-Ghofran Group

texts.en: The Ghofran Group is made up of three ladies who live in Hodeida, Yemen. Sahar is a 36-year-old mother of five children. Since the accident of her husband four years ago, which made him unable to work, she become the only person responsible for taking care of her family. Since then, she still works on selling perfumes and incense from door to door. When ahe heard about AMB, she immediately applied for a loan of 30,000 YER to help her keep going on her job and to buy some more stocks.

loans.use: to stock her business with perfumes and incense.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es: La Sra. Carmela  tiene 46 años, tiene dos hijos de las edades de 14 y 1 años, ella se dedica a la venta de gelatina de patas en su puesto de venta que se encuentra  en la zona de 4 de Octubre,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Carmela  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un frízer y mantener refrigerados sus productos, ya que el que tiene ya se encuentra mal, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio. La Sra. Carmela  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Carmela is 46 years old and has two children, ages 14 and 1. She sells “gelatina de patas” (gelatin made from cow’s feet) from her vending post located in the October 4th District.

This is her first loan with Emprender. Sra. Carmela will use the proceeds to buy freezer for keeping her products chilled. She has already had some of her products go bad. Her reason for requesting this loan is so that she can continue improving her business.

Sra. Carmela is a hardworking individual who is happy with the opportunity that has been given to her. This is the only business by which she is able to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Bertha Isabel

texts.es:
Bertha Isabel tiene 45 años de edad es casada tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Bertha Isabel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos, urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

En la familia la relación ha mejorado porque ahora puede aportar un poco más para el bienestar de la familia, en el trabajo le va mucho mejor porque a aumentado la producción, los ingresos son mayores. Con el apoyo del anterior crédito le ha ayudado a superarse y no tuvo ningún problema para poder cancelar las cuotas establecidas por la cooperativa. 
El sueño es comprar maquinaria agrícola. En el tiemepo libre le gusta leer la biblia.
texts.en:
Bertha Isabel is 45 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Sentiment) is located in the neighborhood of Caimito II in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of the Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Bertha Isabel is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. Her purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. Bertha is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, farming supplies, urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer so that she can keep her crops in good condition.

With her previous loan, she was able to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and poisons in order to maintain the excellent condition of her crops. Her family is doing well because she is now able to provide a little bit more for her for her family’s well-being. Bertha is doing much better in her work since she has been able to increase production. As a result, she has more income. Her previous loan helped her to excel and she did not have any problems submitting her scheduled payments to the Cooperative.

Her dream is to buy farming machines. In her free time, Bertha Isabel enjoys reading the Bible.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farming supplies, urea, herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Konstantin

texts.ru:
Константин  - фермер. С 2004 года занимается выращиванием огурцов, помидоров и поздних томатов.
Справляться по хозяйству ему помогает супруга и старший сын,которому 17-ть лет, он учится на автослесаря.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с одной теплицы, где выращивали молодую капусту и огурец.
Константин решил приобрести пленку для перекрытия теплицы и защиты огурца и помидора от холода и ветра.
В планах на будущее:  расширить количество теплиц.
В личных планах: обеспечить сыну образование.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки для теплицы.
texts.en:
Konstantin is a farmer. Since 2004, he has been cultivating cucumbers and two kinds of tomatoes that produce harvest at different times. In his work, Konstantin is assisted by his wife and his eldest son, who is 17 years old and studying to become a car mechanic. Konstantin's farm was started with a single greenhouse that was used for growing cabbage and cucumbers.

Konstantin has decided to purchase plastic film in order to re-cover his greenhouse and protect his cucumbers and tomatoes from cold and wind. His future business plans include construction of additional greenhouses, while in his personal life he wants to provide his son with good education. Konstantin needs your help to finance the purchase of plastic greenhouse film.

loans.use: to purchase plastic film for his greenhouse

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase equipment to drill a well and install a water pump

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина  -  фермер. С 1992 года занимается выращиванием картофеля и чеснока.
Справляться по хозяйству ей помогает муж и дочь, 18-ти лет, она учится в техникуме на бухгалтера. 
Развитие деятельности начиналось с выращивания молодого картофеля.
Ирина решила приобрести оборудование для скважины и насос, т.к. в данной местности существуют  большие проблемы с водой для полива, особенно в летний период  засухи, полив приходится осуществлять вручную.
В планах на будущие:  посадить виноградник, приобрести мотоблок для вспашки своего земельного участка .
В личных планах: покупка автомобиля для транспортировки товара на рынок сбыта.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования оборудования для скважины.
texts.en:
Irina is a farmer. Since 1992, she has been cultivating potatoes and garlic. She is assisted in her business by her husband and her 18-year-old daughter, who is studying in college to become an accountant. Irina began her farming activity by growing baby potatoes.

Irina has decided to purchase the necessary equipment to drill a water well and install a pump. Her locale has major problems with water for irrigation, particularly during the summer droughts, and it is necessary to irrigate by hand. Her future business plans include starting a grape plantation and purchasing mechanized farming equipment for ploughing her land. She also would like to buy a vehicle to transport her produce to the market. Irina needs your help to finance the purchase of water well equipment.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for drilling a well and installing a water pump

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter, 30, is a farmer in Kitale County, Kenya, where he lives with his wife and three children who are all in school. He has been farming for the past five years, producing milk, vegetables and eggs which he sells at the local market in his area.

He is requesting for 41,600 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow which will provide him with more milk that will generate extra income to help him improve his living standards. He will use some of the money to pay school fees for his children, too. He aspires to have four dairy cows and be one of the main milk suppliers in his area.

The high cost of animal feed is his major challenge in farming.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Don Vicente es una persona humilde del páramo ecuatoriano,  Vicente tiene 48, tiene 5 hijos vive junto a su esposa e hijos, Vicente se define como una persona carismática, honrada, responsable y muy alegre en los momentos que pasa con su familia, Vicente ama mucho a su familia y le encanta el campo, es por ello que desde pequeño se dedicó a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales.
El crédito solicitado a FODEMI se lo invertirá en la compra de dos vacas de doble ordeño ya que se dedicara a la distribución de leche, Vicente comenta que el trabajo del campo es sacrificado pero tiene muchos réditos ya que se pasa en familia y cuando se pone muchas ganas las ganancias económicas son muy buenas.
El sueño que don Vicente tiene es el tener una pequeña finca con muchas cabezas de ganado para ser distribuidor de leche y vender en los mercados y en las comunidades aledañas donde Vicente vive.
texts.en:
Vicente is a humble person from the Ecuadorian plains. Vicente is 48. He has 5 children and lives with his wife and children. Vicente is defined as a charismatic, honest, responsible and very cheerful person during the time he passes with his family. Vicente loves his family very much and he really likes the countryside. That is why, since he was little, he has worked in farming and raising animals.

The loan he has asked FODEMI for will be invested in buying two cows for double milking, because he distributes milk. Vicente says that working in the fields is arduous but has a lot of benefits, because he spends his time with his family and when you really work hard the earnings are very good.

Vicente's dream is to have a small farm with a lot of heads of cattle to be a milk distributor and sell in the markets and in the communities surrounding the area where Vicente lives.

loans.use: to buy two cows for double milking for milk production.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel Antonio mayor de edad, Soltero con cinco  hijos de  43,42,38,36 y 33 de edad, todos mayores de edad e independientes, Manuel se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general negocio administraba junto con su esposa, es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable  poco a poco él logra adquirir su propiedad de habitación y con ayuda de sus hijos ha ido realizando ciertas mejoras a su vivienda,la reparación de la cocina y terminar de construir un closet del cuarto él está muy agradecido con el apoyo que se le ha brindado nos esta solicitando financiamiento para la realizar ciertas mejoras en su hogar en la compra de materiales de construcción como: bloques, cemento, arena, Hierro y otros materiales más. Uno de su deseo es terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en: Manuel Antonio is an single adult with children aged 43, 42, 38, 36 and 33 years old. All of them are grown and on their own. Manuel sells general merchandise, a business he ran with his wife. He is a very hardworking and responsible person. Little by little, he was able to acquire his own home and with his children's help he has done some improvements on his house, repairing the kitchen and finishing a closet in his room. He is very grateful for the support that has been given. He is asking us for a loan to do some improvements on the home, buying construction materials such as: blocks, cement, sand, iron rods and more materials. One of the things he wants to finish building his home.

loans.use: to continue with the home improvement by repairing the kitchen and bedrooms.

loans.name: Aleyda Maryinee

texts.es: Aleyda tiene 41 años ahora es soltera trabaja más que nunca para mantener a sus 3 hijos, recibe ayuda económica de su ex compañero, sus créditos los utiliza para comprar pacas de ropa y cosméticos en esta ocasión invertirá nuevamente en lo mismo para aumentar sus ventas, así ella ayuda a sus hijos para su desarrollo tanto con la escuela y su alimentación, desea poner una pequeña tiendita en su casa y no andar vendiendo ambulante, así ella  podrá tener más cerca a sus hijos y atenderlos mejor.
texts.en: Aleyda is 41 years old. She is single now and working harder than ever to support her 3 children. She receives financial help from her ex. She uses the loans to buy bundles of clothing and cosmetics. At this time, she will invest again in the same thing to increase her sales. This is how she helps her children for their development, both in school and in their nutrition. She wants to open a little store in her house and not sell door to door. That way, she can be closer to her children and care for them better.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothes as well as cosmetics.

loans.name: Sahib

texts.en:
Sahib is 26 years old and a married father of two children, aged two and four. His mother lives with them and the pension that she receives contributes to the joint family budget. Since 2007 he has been working as a taxi driver. He owns the taxi that he drives but it is an old car with many used spare parts. He plans to improve the car and earn more money so that he is ready for his children's education expenses.

Currently Sahib is requesting a loan to be able to buy materials for the repair of the bathroom of his house. In this way he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy materials for the repair of his bathroom.

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
Doris is a 48-year-old farmer who lives in Nkubu county, Kenya. She and her husband have two children, one of whom is still at school. She has been in farming for the past fifteen years, producing french beans, fruits and milk, which she sells at the local market in her area. Crop failure, pests and diseases are the major challenges for her farming. 

Doris is requesting a 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) loan from Juhudi Kilimo to venture into poultry farming, which will help her in generating more income to boost her family's livelihood. She will use some of the money to pay for her children's schooling and she aspires to be the leading supplier of her agricultural products in the area in the next five years.

loans.use: To purchase poultry for farming

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 36 years old and married to Sydney. She has had a grazing business in Kayole, Kenya for the last three years and earns an income of 18,500 Kenyan shillings (KES) per month.

Susan is applying for her first loan of 100,000 KES from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy two dairy cows. She will use the anticipated profit to further improve her business. In the future, she hopes to open a dairy.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Moureen

texts.en:
Moureen used her previous loan amount to buy more poultry for rearing and selling. These included layers and broilers together with poultry feeds. It was profitable and she was able to repay the loan amount well and in good time.

Besides the poultry business, she also sells clothes. These include dresses, shirts and curtains and the business has enabled her to get more income. This being her second loan term, she plans to use the loan amount to buy more inventory of clothes to sell. She anticipates making more income which she will use to add more variety of clothes.

Moureen hopes to grow her business by opening a big boutique business in Nakuru town.

loans.use: to add more inventory of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela is 44 years old and married with 2 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Adela earns a living by fishing in the Philippines. Adela requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing equipment and to repair her fishing boat.

She has been in this business for three years. In the future, Adela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment and repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a 48-year-old woman who is confident she can lift her family out of their poor living conditions. She did not graduate from college but she promised herself that she would provide a better living for her family. There are many businesses that she has been involved in, but her bag-selling business has worked the best. 

She has been this business for over two years. She wants to improve and boost-up her income from day-to-day operational sales. This led her to request a loan of PHP 40,000 to purchase more bags to sell. She hopes to obtain her requested loan to further improve and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase more bags to sell.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 35 years old and married to Alfred. She does zero grazing and meat supply in Kayole.  She has been in this business for the last four years and gets an income of KES 24,000 per month.

She is applying for her first loan of KES 100,000 from KADET LTD which she will use to buy two dairy cows. She will use the anticipated profit to buy food.

She hopes to  expand her dairy farming.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Ablaye

texts.fr: Monsieur Ablaye est un agriculteur avéré qui a une expérience de plus de 15 ans. Il est marié et père de famille. Il passe la plupart de son temps dans son champ ou il fait du maraichage. Il est à son tout premier crédit à l’IMCEC et désire un montant de 100000F CFA afin de pouvoir acheter  du gasoil, de l’engrais, du fumier et des produits phytosanitaires. Ablaye possède un large champ dont il n’a exploité qu’une partie et il désire élargir son activité s’il a l’appui de l’IMCEC pour un autre financement.
texts.en: Mr Ablaye is a known farmer who has more than 15 years experience in this domain. He is married and the father of a family. He spend the majority of his time in his field, where he grow vegetables. He is asking for his first loan from IMCEC for 100000 FCFA (approximately 200 USD) in order to purchase petrol, fertilizer, manure and other phytosanitary products. Ablaye owns a large field of which he farms only a section, and he hopes that this loan will enable him to expand his activity.

loans.use: purchase petrol, fertilizer, manure and other phytosanitary products

loans.name: Teona

texts.en:
Teona is 24 years old. She lives with her husband and 2 children in the small village of Gurjaani district, East Georgia. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a horse and 6 pigs whose meat is sold locally in an open market at a good price. They also have a vineyard and a plot of agricultural land where garden strawberries are grown. They sell the harvested products locally at a good price. 

Teona is very hard working young woman and does her best to insure in a good harvest. She requested a loan for purchasing a milk cow. After purchasing a milk cow, she will be able to produce dairy products and increase the livestock. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income they will be able to improve the living conditions of the family. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.en:
Amparo is 71 years old and a widow with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. Amparo runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

Amparo has borrowed and repaid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for 15 years and also earns an income from charcoal retail. Amparo hopes to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is 57 years old and comes from a small village of Gurjaani district, East Georgia. She lives with her husband and son. Her husband works as an artisan locally and her son works as a teacher at a local school; they both get a monthly income. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a plot of land where peach trees are grown. They sell the harvested peaches locally at a good price. 

Marine is very hard-working woman and does her best to insure a good harvest. She requested a loan for purchasing a cow. After purchasing a cow, she will be able to produce dairy products and increase the income of the family. With increased income they will be able to improve their living conditions. Marine awaits  your support.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Maguèye

texts.fr: Monsieur Maguèye est cultivateur de profession et a acquis une expérience de plus de 15 ans dans ce métier. Lui il s’est spécialisé dans la culture du manioc. Maguèye est marié et père de famille, il gère sa petite famille en s’occupant quotidiennement de leur besoins alimentaires. Il  est à son second crédit et aimerait développer son activité avec un crédit de 150000F CFA, avec cela il pourra améliorer son épargne et l’alimentation des membres de sa famille. Il désire aussi avec une augmentation de revenus exploiter d’autres champs en réserve.
texts.en:
Maguèye is a farmer by profession, with over 15 years of farming experience. He specializes in growing manioc.

Maguèye is both a husband and a father. He looks after his small family by taking care of their daily food needs.

He is on his second loan, and he would like to develop his business with a loan of 150,000 CFA. The loan will enable him to increase his savings and improve his family's diet. He also wants to use his increased revenue to farm other fields currently in reserve.

loans.use: to buy manioc seeds to improve his farming operations

loans.name: Jelyluz

texts.en:
Jelyluz is 34 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like biscuits, soft drinks and other groceries to sell.

Jelyluz has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from buying and selling fermented shrimp.

Jelyluz aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like biscuits, soft drinks and other groceries to sell

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick sells sewing materials to various tailoring businesses in Ndunyu Njeru town. He also supplies wool to the tailors as well as carpenters for making sofa sets. He is 42 years old, married to Mary, and has four children.

This is his second loan and he plans to buy more stock of sewing materials and wool and thereby have enough stock to sell and supply to his customers who are increasing day by day. He anticipates to make more income which he will use to pay school fees for his children.

He hopes to expand his business by distributing wool and sewing materials to various tailoring traders in and out of Nakuru town.

loans.use: To buy material and wool.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Due to the hardship of living, Marlyn engages in selling 'buko' pies (coconut pies), corn and 'buko' juice (coconut juice) in the local community. This is her way of helping her husband in generating income. Being responsible parents, they aim to educate their three children and give them a better life. In this regard, Marlyn aims to strengthen her business to generate a higher income. 

Due to financial constraints, she is asking for a loan of P 25,000 to buy more stocks of corn, 'buko' pie  and 'buko' juice  for sale. She believes that this loan will be a great help to improve the business and hopes that she will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of corn, 'buko' pies and 'buko' juice for sale

loans.name: Tamaz

texts.en:
Tamaz, 54 years old, is from a small village of Baghdati district. He lives with his mother, wife and two daughters. His mother is provided with a retirement pension. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a milk cow and two calves. The milk is used in cheese production. They sell cheese locally in an open market at a good price. In addition, they have a vineyard and a greenhouse where tomatoes and cucumbers are grown. They sell the harvested products and vodka locally. 

Tamaz is very hardworking man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. He requested a loan for purchasing a milk cow. After purchasing an additional milk cow, they will be able to produce more dairy products. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income, they will be able to improve their living conditions. Tamaz awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Ndèye

texts.fr:
Madame Ndèye est une dame qui fait le commerce depuis 6 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de famille.
Elle possède une cantine ou elle vend des habits pour enfants, des chaussures, des tissus, des produits cosmétiques…Elle ouvre tous les jours sa boutique de 8h du matin à 19h du soir. Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle appuie à la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et règles ses problèmes personnels. Elle désire élargir un jour son magasin.
texts.en: Mrs Ndèye has been involved in commerce activity for the past six years. She is married and a mother of a family. She owns a stall where she sells children's clothing, shoes and cosmetic products. Her shop is open every day from 8 am to 7 pm. The profits from this activity are spent on the daily expenses of her family and other personal issues. She hopes to one day expand her business.

loans.use: purchase cloth and clothing for children

loans.name: Al-Hanan Group

texts.en:
The Al-Hanan group is made up of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. The members have different types of businesses. 

Jomah is 36 years old, a mother of eight children. Her husband immigrated to Saudi Arabia a long time ago. Since then, they have heard nothing about him. So, this mother has started to work hard for her children. She has been selling clothes and perfumes for many years. She doesn't get other income and intends to expand her business. For this reason, she took out a loan of 30,000 Yemeni rials from AMB to buy additional clothes and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy additional clothes and perfumes for resale.

loans.name: Bada

texts.fr: Monsieur Bada fait du maraichage depuis 15 ans. Il est marié et père de famille. Il est très actif et commence sa journée à 7h pour la terminer à 17h du soir. Bada n’est pas un novice dans les crédits et en est à son second, avec lequel, il pourra acheter une motopompe et des semences de pomme de terre pour son exploitation agricole. Il fait aussi de la vente d’autres variétés de légumes comme on le voit sur la photo près de gros et jolis choux pommés. Il s’occupe de sa famille en subvenant à leur besoin en nourriture. S’il a les moyens il aimerait bien exploiter d’autres périmètres non encore fonctionnels
texts.en: Mr Bada has been growing vegetables for the past 15 years. He is married and the father of a family. He is very dynamic and begins his days at 7 am, finishing around 5 pm. Bada is not a novice regarding loans and is asking for his second, which will enable him to purchase a motor-pump and grains to grow potatoes. He also sells other varietes of vegetables including the large and lovely cabbages seen in the photo. He takes care of his faimly including their nutritional needs. He hopes to have the means to further expand his agricutural activity on sections of his land that are currently not functional.

loans.use: purchase a motor-pump and seeds to grow potatoes

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 37 years old and married with 3 children.

Esther works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Esther has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from hog raising.

Esther aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Richard Ladu

texts.en:
Richard, a serious businessman who lives in yei, achieved the following with his previous loan:  he increased his stock, and he sent one of his children to school.

Now Richard is taking a new loan, to buy more shoes, sandals and many other items, for his inventory. He says that he is happy to receive the loan.

loans.use: to buy more items, like shoes and sandals, to resell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives with her husband and 5 children in Dabir, near Elmina. Mary produces red oil, palm oil, and kennel oil for sale, which she has done for some  years now. She is married and has 5 children. Mary uses her income to support her husband to feed and clothe their children.

Mary will use her loan to purchase palm fruit to enable her produce her palm oil and kennel oil in large quantities. With the new profits, Mary will buy a machine for the production of her oil.

loans.use: to buy palm fruit to enable her to produce palm oil and kennel oil in large quantities.

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.ru:
Юрий выращивает ранние овощи в теплицах. В прошлый раз он использовал КИВА кредит для установки отопления в теплицах. В результате получил хороший доход и смог купить автомобиль, на котором он теперь может вывозить свою продукнию на оптовый рынок для продажи по более выгодным ценам.  

Недавно умерла бабушка Юрия, которая жила вместе с его семьей; много денег ушло  на похороны, при этом часть денег пришлось взять с бизнеса. В этот раз Юрий просит предоставить ему кредит для закупки семян и удобрений. Все остальное (теприцы, отопление, полив) уже готовы к новому сезону.
texts.en:
Yuryi cultivates early vegetables in greenhouses. He used his last Kiva loan to install a greenhouse heating system. As a result, he earned a good profit and could afford to buy a vehicle, which he now uses to transport his produce to a bulk market, where he sells it at a better price.

Recently, Yuryi's grandmother, who lived with his family, passed away. A lot of money was spent on the funeral, and it was necessary to take some money out of the business.

This time, Yuryi is asking for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. Everything else (greenhouses, heating and irrigation systems) are ready for the new growing season.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is 31 years old, married to Caroline. He operates M-pesa services [mobile-phone based money transfer services] in Makueni. He has been in this business for the last four years and makes an income of 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) per month.

Philip has a good credit history with KADET Ltd. He is applying for his third loan of 100,000 KES which he plans to use to increase his M-pesa float. He will save the anticipated profit for future family stability. He hopes to have a firm and a family that has full access to financial stability.

loans.use: to increase float of his M-pesa [mobile-phone based money transfer service].

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use:
to buy blocks, cement, sand, stone and iron and pay for the labor 
to build a perimeter wall.

loans.name: Burmakan

texts.ru: Бурмакан 46 лет,замужем, имеет сына. Сын Учится в Университете. Бурмакан имеет среднее образование, по характеру очень спокойная и хозяйственная женщина. Бурмакан в качестве основного дохода для ее семьи, с 2002 года занимается животноводством и с 1992 года занимается полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Бурмакан, на сегодняшний день у нее имеется 2 голов КРС, 21 голов МРС и обрабатывает 3,6 га земли, где ежегодно выращивает фасоль и многолетние травы. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 5,000 сом. Доходы от бизнеса позволяют Бурмакан оплачивать обучение сына. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бурмакан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на закуп 2 коров. Доходы от кредита Бурмакан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса посредством увеличения хозяйства, а на следующий год сделать ремонт и женить сына.
texts.en:
Burmakan is 46 years old, married, and has a son who is currently a university student. Burmakan has secondary education. She is a very calm and enterprising woman. As the main source of income for her family, Burmakan has been raising livestock since 2002, as well as growing crops since 1992, having started her business with a sum of 20,000 som. Thanks to her hard work, Burmakan's herd currently includes 2 cows and 21 goats and sheep, and she also works 3.6 hectares of land where she annually grows beans and perennial grasses. Her monthly profits total approximately 5,000 som and allow her to pay for her son's education.

In order to continue developing her business, Burmakan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy 2 cows. She plans to invest her profits from this loan into further growth of her business by expanding her activities. Next year she would like to repair her house and hold a wedding for her son.

loans.use: to purchase 2 dairy cows

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah, 43, is the mother of three children. She is married to Lamech and runs a retail shop in Nakuru. She has operated it for three years and it has been profitable.

This is her first loan term, and she plans to buy more stocks of rice, sugar, maize flour and cooking oil which are usually in high demand. She also plans to buy stationery items such as exercise books, pens and pencils. She anticipates generating more income, which she will use to add more stock.

She hopes to grow her business and make more income and thereby be able to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice, sugar, flour, and stationery.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy gravel, cement, sand, and cement blocks to build a room and perimeter wall.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is 39 years old. She is hoping in lifting up her family from poor living. She engaged herself in selling of beauty products in the village. Through this she’s able to provide daily needs of her family. 

She wants to improve and boost her income. This caused her to requests a loan of PHP 9,000 to purchase lotion, face powder, lipstick and hair wax. She hopes to achieve her requested loan to further improve her businesses and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase lotion, face powder, lipstick and hair wax.

loans.name: Medina

texts.en:
Medina is 55 years old and married. She has three children.

Medina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Medina has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from hog raising.

Medina aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en: Florida is 43 years old and is married to Benny, a father who works as a foreman. While Florida keeps busy managing their food selling business, primarily selling frozen foods, the couple are both working hard to boost the family income and to lift their children from living poor. Florida has been engaged in her business for 12 years and earns a maximum of about PHP 1,500 a week. Right now, she is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 30,000 to purchase hot dogs, "langgonisa" (sausages) and "toccino" (bacon) to sell. She hopes that with the help of this loan amount she will reach her desired net income and be able to save for their future.

loans.use: to purchase hot dogs, "langgonisa" and "toccino" to sell.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 60 years old, married, and has three adult-age children. Despite the hardship of living, she aspires to become successful someday. She is engaged in selling snacks in the local community to supplement her husband's income. She aims to improve the business and increase her income in order to satisfy their basic needs and save some for future emergencies. 

In this regard, she plans to continue to strengthen the business in order to increase her income. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional PHP15,000 to buy more stock of corn, buko (coconut) pie and buko juice (coconut juice) to sell. Through this loan, she believes that she will go on to improve the business and make it more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stock of corn, buko (coconut) pie and buko juice to sell.

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en:
Timothy, now 23 years of age, used his previous loan to buy a new motorbike, and it has been profitable.

This being his second loan term, he plans to use the loan amount in addition to his savings to buy another motorcycle. This will enable him to increase his income, which he will use to pay school fees for his daughter.

Timothy hopes to invest more in the transport business by buying a pickup and a lorry for his transportation business.

loans.use: To buy a new motorbike.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: This industrious housewife named Elizabeth is a mother of two children. She operates a fish selling business as a source of income. Through her hard work and her business, she is able to meet her family’s daily needs. She is aiming for more income in order to save for future use. Presently, she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy more fish to sell. This would increase her total net sales every month and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Despite financial difficulty, Judy and her husband aim to improve their living status in order to continue sending their four children to college and to give them a better life. In this regard, Judy engages in selling boiled corn, buko pie and buko juice in their village to generate additional income. 

She plans to improve the business in order to generate sufficient income. To improve the business, she is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy more stocks of corn, buko pie and buko juice for sale. She believes that she will make more improvements in the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of corn, buko pie and buko juice (coconut pie and juice) for sale.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene, a mother of two children, age 9 and 1, is 28 years old and married to George. 

She has a retail shop in Nakuru town and has been in the business for three years.

This being her first loan from KADET Ltd., she plans to buy more stock of sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour to sell in her retail shop. She will use the generated income to buy more stock of goods to sell.

She hopes to make more income and be able to open a mini supermarket.

loans.use: To buy more stock of sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour for sale.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 17 years. She earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more groceries, such as bread, canned goods, soap and other miscellaneous items for her general store business.

Imelda hopes to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more groceries, such as bread, canned goods, soap and other miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Edmalyn

texts.en:
Edmalyn has been engaged in a food vending business for over three years. She wants to grow her business so that she can save for the education of her three children.

Despite the hardship of this job, she patiently and successfully provides for their everyday necessities. She is aiming for high income that would improve their living condition. This motivated her to ask for a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy bananas to make banana chips and banana cue (fried bananas in brown sugar) to sell in the village.

loans.use: to buy bananas to make banana chips and banana cue.

loans.name: Jeniffer

texts.en:
Jeniffer is 34 years old, married and supports a family of six. She runs a poultry farming business as well as growing horticulture crops for sale. She has been in the business for three years with a monthly income from the business of KES 15,000.

She has borrowed a loan of KES 6,000 for a period of six months, which she intends to use to purchase chicken feed, indigenous chickens and farm inputs to expand her business. 

She plans to use the additional income to plough back into the business and to educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase chicken feeds and indigenous chickens.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a mother who aimed to become successful in life. She is 49 years old and was blessed with three children. She owns and manages a variety store in their community to generate income. She has been in the business for almost 10 years and usually earns a profit of only PHP 7,000 a month which she utilizes for their daily consumption and to save some for their future.

She aims to increase her product offerings in order to satisfy all her customers' demands. Gloria is asking for additional capital of PHP 12,000 to buy soft drinks, biscuits, junk foods, candies, mineral waters, beverages, canned goods and seasonings to sell. Through her patience and sacrifices, she believes that she will continue to make an improvement in the business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, biscuits, junk foods, candies, mineral waters, beverages, canned goods and seasonings to sell.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a tailoring business in the Philippines. Vilma has been in this business for 18 years. Vilma earns additional income from charcoal retail.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy materials needed like dress pins, beads transfer and other tools.

Vilma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy materials needed like dress pins, beads transfer and other tools.

loans.name: Jilna

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Jilna works hard to support her family. She has a variety store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Jilna is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her store.

Jilna has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her store.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a 32-year-old farmer. She lives in Kitale county in Kenya with her husband and three children, who are all in school. She has been farming for the past seven years, producing eggs, tomatoes, maize and milk which she sells at the local market in her area. Jane is requesting a 60,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds. This will increase her production, and from the products she will earn extra income that will help her uplift her livelihood and pay for her children's schooling. She aspires to own an extra cow and a posho mill within the next five years, which will help her generate more income for her family. Pests and diseases are her major challenges with farming.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary sells doughnuts at Asebu, near Cape Coast. She is a single parent and has four children. Mary has been in the doughnut-selling business for two years. She uses her income to feed and clothe her children and to pay their school fees. 

Mary's loan will be used to buy cooking oil and bags of flour and sugar to prepare her doughnuts for sale. She hopes to use the new profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil and bags of flour and sugar to prepare her doughnuts for sale.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is 64 years old and a widow with five children.

Milagros is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Milagros requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional pigs and feeds.

Milagros has been raising pigs for three years now, and she has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Milagros would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs and feeds.

loans.name: Geraldo Pablo

texts.es:
Geraldo es un hombre de 34 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Geraldo no pudo estudiar una carrera militar para convertirse en Policía, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Geraldo trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable, que brinda a sus clientes.
Geraldo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra mayor cantidad de mercadería, tales como abarrotes, bebidas, golosinas y otros, de esta manera tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Geraldo, 34, lives in the city of Pucallpa with his beloved wife and two small children, who are his reason for living. He is very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic and dedicates all his effort to helping his family get ahead. Sadly, Geraldo lacked resources and needed to pay expenses, so he wasn't able to study to be a police officer, as he wished. He likes to play soccer with his friends in his free time and cook a delicious garlic chicken dish to share with his family. 

On his initiative and with perseverance, Geraldo runs a small grocery store where he works for about 10 hours each day from early morning. He enjoys his work and believes the store prospers because he offers affordable prices and good service to his customers. 

Geraldo thanks the Kiva lenders, whose support will let him buy wholesale merchandise such as groceries, beverages, and sweets so that he can expand his inventory and service more customers. He will keep working very hard to achieve his great dream to own a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Nolita

texts.en:
Nolita is 37 years old and married with three children. Two of them are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Nolita has a fishing business in the Philippines. Nolita has been in this business for 11 years.

Nolita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing net and other equipment.

In the future, Nolita would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama operates a grocery, which she has done for 5 years now. The items in her grocery shop are different kinds of soft drinks, biscuits, toffees, powdered milk, etc. She is married with 5 children.   

Ama uses her income to help her husband pay their children’s school fees. She will use her loan to purchase variety of groceries to sell. With the new profit, she plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy video games and controls to update her programs.

loans.name: Saitore

texts.en:
Saitore is 47 years old and married to Ntotoi who is a farmer, and they are blessed with four children. Saitore owns a butchery and hotel in Kimana Oloitoktok. He has been in this business for the last 12 years and gets an income of about KES 63,900 per month.

He has a good credit history with KADET LTD and he is applying for his second loan of KES 100,000 from KADET LTD with which he plans to buy more stock for the hotel and the butchery; that is, food such as meat, and also furniture, charcoal, etc.

Saitore will use the anticipated profit to buy more acres of land for farming and raising livestock.

loans.use: To buy more stock for the butchery and hotel; that is, food such as meat and also furniture, charcoal, etc.

loans.name: Memuna

texts.en:
Memuna is single and has four children. She has received schooling through senior high school. Memuna is a seamstress and she also sells sewing thread, and lining at Akatakyiwa, which she has done for five years. She uses her income to support her children. 

Memuna will use the loan to purchase more sewing machines and fabric for her sewing work. With the new profits from her expanded business, Memuna plans to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sewing machines and fabric for her sewing work.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is a fish monger. She sells salted fish at Besease near Elmina. She is married to a farmer and has 4 children.  She has been a fish monger for the past 10 years now. Efua assists her husband in the upkeep of their children.

She will use her loan to purchase more salted fish to sell. Efua will expand her business with her new profit.

loans.use: to purchase more salted fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, beans and other ingredients for the preparation of waakye for sale.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama sells plastic bowls and saucepans at Esuekyir, near Cape Coast. She is married.  She has been selling plastic bowls and saucepans for two years now. She supports her husband in paying their housing and utility bills. She will use her loan to purchase more saucepans and plastic bowls  to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a shop for the sale of her cooking utensils.

loans.use: to purchase saucepans and plastic bowls for resale

loans.name: Ever Jose

texts.es: Don Ever es casado su esposa es modista tienen 3 hijos todos estudiantes, continua siempre con su trabajo como mesero en un restaurante en el cual lleva muchos años de experiencia, los créditos los ha utilizado para mejorar su vivienda, esta vez desea hacer divisiones de cuartos, repello de paredes de su casa para esto comprara laminas de gypsun, separadores metálicos, arena, cemento, su propósito es tener una casa digna donde vivir y dejarle a sus hijos un buen hogar así como también estudien y se preparen profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Ever is married and his wife is a dressmaker. They have 3 children, all students. He continues, as always, with his work as a waiter in a restaurant where he has many years experience. He has used his loans to make improvements to his home. This time, he wants to divide up rooms and cover walls within his house. To do so, he will buy sheets of gypsum, metal separators, sand, and cement. 

His goal is to have a dignified house where they can live, and to provide a good home for his children where they can study and prepare themselves for a profession.

loans.use: to buy sheets of gypsum, metal separators, sand and cement.

loans.name: Essé

texts.fr: Essé est une jeune dame qui est mariée à un revendeur. Ils ont 03 enfants tous sur les bancs d'école. Ils sont âgés de 18,15 et 08ans. Pour prêter main forte à son conjoint, elle fait du commerce des céréales et des produits d'alimentation générale. cette activité se déroule à domicile. Afin de stocker plus de céréales, elle fait un premier prêt à WAGES. Comme perspectives d'avenir, elle veut construire tout en assurant les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en: Essé is a young lady who is married to a salesman. They have three children all of whom attend school. They are 18, 15 and 5 years old. To help her husband, Essé sells cereals and groceries. She does this from her home. In order to stock more cereals, she requests a first loan from Wages. As a future prospect, she wants to develop at the same time as ensuring her family's basic necessities.

loans.use: To buy cereals.

loans.name: Primitiva

texts.en:
Primitiva is married, with five children. She offers different kinds of vegetables inside the public market of Santiago. She has been running her specialized stall for 25 years.

Primitiva would like to take out a loan of PHP 10,000, allowing her to buy necessary vegetables. She hopes that she could improve her buying and selling of vegetables, so she could educate her daughter and sustain their daily needs. Primitiva knows that her requested loan amount would really be a great help in improving her sales and her living condition.

loans.use: to buy a variety of vegetables for her specialized stall.

loans.name: Las Zutujiles Group

texts.es:
La señora Socorro Ignacia esta casada, tiene 48 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educación primaria, tiene  7 hijos de los cuales estudian 3, se dedica a la artesanía, a la confección de blusas típicas, inicio este negocio siendo operaria para otro negocio, ha tenido éxito, hasta el momento lleva 11 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

Organiza un grupo y hace la solicitud de un préstamo que sera utilizado para compra de telas e hilos, las cuales son necesaria para la ampliación de su producción de blusas típicas, ya que en el futuro espera tener un negocio prospero. Las demás integrantes se dedica a la artesanía y al comercio.
texts.en:
Socorro Ignacia is married and 48. She finished fifth grade and has seven children, three of whom are students. She makes handicrafts and traditional blouses. She was a sewing machine operator for another business before she started her own successful business 11 years ago. Her husband, who is a bricklayer, is supportive.

She organized a communal bank and applied for a loan that will be used to buy the fabric and thread needed to increase her traditional blouse production, since she expects the business to prosper. The other members are merchants and make handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en: Ofelia runs a small variety store in the community to generate income. She is 46 years old and has three school-age children. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, she aimed to improve the business in order to generate sufficient income to support the education of her children. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy more stock of soft drinks, beverages, noodles in a cup, snack foods and biscuits for sale. Through this loan, she believes that someday, she will improve the business and make it more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stock of soft drinks, beverages, noodles in a cup, snack foods and biscuits for sale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 39 years old and married with three children aged 12, 4 and 2 years old. He offers transport services, operating on different routes. Joseph has been in this operation for a period of over six years, earning monthly income of 30,000 KES (Kenyan shillings).

He is servicing his third loan of 80,000 KES from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. He intends to use this amount to service his vehicle.  

The profits he earns will be used to pay school fees for his school-going children. He hopes to educate his children to greater levels.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy goats for a meat shop.

loans.name: Hector

texts.en: Hector, 46, is requesting a loan amount of PHP 10,000 to buy feed and vitamins for his livestock, in prevention of food deficiency. He wants to make them nourished and healthy, to earn a higher income for security purposes, in times of emergencies as well as for the studies of his three children. It is pretty difficult, but his willingness to lift his family from poor living encourages him to execute the work.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for his livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an ice cream-making machine for the ice cream-selling business.

loans.name: Elba Ines

texts.es:
Elba es una mujer de 34 años, creció en una familia de escasos recursos en la cual consiguió el apoyo para terminar la escuela primaria, trabajó ayudando a sus padres desde muy joven y ahora convive con su pareja Ángel de 64 años que se dedica al comercio ambulante y con quien tiene 3 hijos quienes se educan en una escuela pública y Elba espera poder apoyarles en su educación hasta que se conviertan en profesionales de excelencia. Elba y su familia viven en la Parroquia de Río Verde de Santo Domingo, la capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, una provincia de Ecuador que en los últimos años ha tenido un alto crecimiento sostenido. Su capital  es una ciudad en donde lo más atractivo y llamativo son sus deliciosas frutas, y la gastronomía que ofrecen en el lugar. También cuenta con un comercio considerable  ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio comercial entre las regiones Sierra y Costa del país. Además cuenta con varios atractivos turísticos que acompañados de su clima cálido son muy concurridos por turistas nacionales y extranjeros. Es por esto que la mayoría de sus habitantes han emprendido con alguna actividad comercial o de servicios para habitantes y turistas.
Elba y su esposo han vivido situaciones difíciles económicamente pero no se han dado por vencidos y siempre han llevado el alimento a la mesa y a sus hijos nunca les ha faltado nada para su educación. Sin embargo, hace 4 años Elba decidió aportar a su hogar preparando unos helados con una receta secreta de su familia, los cuales son muy conocidos en la zona. Ella los prepara en las noches, cuando sus chicos ya descansan y los vende en el día con la ayuda de sus hijos que le acompañan al volver de la escuela.  Al dar a conocer el exquisito y refrescante sabor de sus helados, Elba ha ganado clientes y muy buena reputación, por lo que los helados se terminan inmediatamente ya que apenas prepara la cantidad que puede almacenar en su refrigeradora. Ahora Elba requiere un préstamo para poder adquirir un congelador exclusivo para helados, de esta forma produciría más y sus ganancias serán mayores. Anteriormente ya ha realizado créditos con Fundación Alternativa y ha regresado a solicitar su ayuda porque le ofrecen facilidades de pago y la atención es excelente, mucho más ahora que puede aplicar al producto de kiva para que muchas personas en el mundo también formen parte de su sueño de crecimiento.
texts.en:
Elba is a 34-year old woman who grew up in a family with limited resources. Nevertheless, she had the support to finish primary education, worked helping her parents since she was very young and now lives with her partner, Angel (64 years old), who works as a traveling salesman. Together they have 3 children, who attend a public school, and Elba expects to be able to provide them with an education to become excellent professionals. Elba and her family live in La Parroquia de Río Verde, in Santo Domingo, capital of the Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, Ecuador, which has experienced a great sustainable growth in the last few years. The biggest attraction in the capital is its delicious fruit and cuisine. It also counts with a significant commercial sector, as it has become a ground port of commercial exchange between the Sierra and Costa regions. Moreover, it has several tourist attractions which, together with the warm weather, attract many local and foreign tourists. For this reason, the majority of its population has initiated a commercial or services activity for other residents or tourists. 

Elba and her husband have gone through financially difficult situations, but they have never given up and have always been able to bring food to their home and to provide their children with everything they needed for their education. However, 4 years ago, Elba decided to contribute to the household expenses by preparing ice cream with a secret recipe of her family, and it has become very popular in the area. She makes it at nights, when her children are sleeping, and sells it during the day with her kids' help, who give her a hand when they come back from school. Thanks to the delicious and refreshing flavor of her ice cream, Elba has earned clients and a very good reputation. She makes the quantity she can fit in her freezer and the ice cream is sold immediately. 
 
Elba is now requesting a loan to buy a freezer exclusively for ice cream, so that she will be able to make a larger quantity and increase her earnings. She has had loans with Fundación Alternativa before and has decided to ask for financial support again given that the repayment conditions and the service she receives are excellent. She is excited to use this Kiva loan and to share her business growth dream with many people around the world.

loans.use: to buy a freezer exclusively for the sale of ice cream.

loans.name: Chuaxic Central 1 Group

texts.es:
La señora Maria esta casada, tiene 33 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 6 hijos de los cuales 4 están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta de helados y la venta de verduras, inicio este negocio con  poco capital y hasta el momento lleva 9 años de experiencia, y le ha resultado bien en su negocio, cuenta con al apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.
