She works as an agricultural producer having started when she was a girl and becoming independent at the age of 18 thanks to a material inheritance she got from her parents.  

She feels good with her work because she’s able to support her family with profits earned.  When the rainy season starts in the zone she wants to be able to hire day laborers for the coffee and annatto crops and to do so must have enough capital available.  Another requirement needed for quality products is to purchase organic manure which can be gotten now at a modest price due to demand thus being able to provide integrated fertilization of her parcels.

One of the reasons behind her efforts once her children have grown is to build her house with bricks and cement so she can rent it out and earn a steady income for her old age.  She wants to have 4,000 new soles to pay day laborers and to buy sacks of guano from the island to start growing coffee and annatto when the rainy season starts in the zone.

loans.use: to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Sinapi

texts.en: Sinapi is a 41-year-old married woman with 3 children. She would like to start growing taro, banana, yam and taamu (giant taro) to earn a living. Sinapi has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, and spade etc. Sinapi use spend her profits to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives and spade etc

loans.name: Suluama

texts.en: Suluama is 27 years old and married with 3 children. She has a small shop selling general items in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy a bag of flour, sugar sack, kitchen utensils and junk food. In the future, Suluama hopes to extend her business in the future. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and general items for her shop

loans.name: Fetineiai

texts.en: Fetineiai is 37 years old and married with 2 children. She has a small shop selling general items in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy a bag of flour, sugar sack, kitchen utensils and junk food. In the future, Fetineai hopes to extend her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour sack, sugar sack, and general items for her shop

loans.name: Dúo Inspiración De Sacatepequez Group

texts.es: Dúo Inspiracion de Sacatepequez, integrado por la representante Dominga de 41 años madre soltera, se dedica al cultivo y venta de verduras de su producto desde hace 21 años, en el mercado de la capital, ella cultiva ejote, espinaca, acelga, berro, y siembra en varios terrenos que posee para no depender solo de una cosecha, tiene dos empleados,  necesita un capital para invertir y cultivar nuevas legumbre,esa solicitando el credito para la compra de semillas y abonos para el cultivo.
texts.en: Dúo Inspiracion de Sacatepequez, includes the representative Dominga, a 41 year old single mother.  She has been devoted to growing and selling vegetables for 21 years at the market in the capital.  She grows green beans, spinach, chard and watercress.  She has two employees, and they grow in various plots in order to not depend on only one harvest.  She is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer for cultivation.  She needs capital to invest in order to grow new legumes.

loans.use: to purchase seed and fertilizer for cultivation.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in the Malindi area of Coast province. She is a mother of five children, although only one still attends school. She operates a hawking business, which has been in operation for nine years. She started the business with her own, little savings. In this business she sells clothes, shawls, bras and the like. She is also employed.

She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to a group. She joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve the operation of the business. The challenges she is facing are seasonal business climate, high cost of purchasing stock, and finding customers. 

Rose is applying for a loan of 41,850 Kenyan shillings to buy additional stock of second-hand clothes, and also to pay for her child’s fees. Her extra income from the loan will be added to her savings and used to expand her business and for personal expenses.

loans.use: To buy more stock of second-hand clothes and also to pay for her child’s fees.

loans.name: Tuimalo

texts.en: Tuimaolo is 60 years old and married with 7 children. She has a small shop  selling general items in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy a bag of flour, sugar sack, kitchen utensils and junk food. In the future, Tuimalo hopes to extend her business in the future. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour sack, sugar sack, and general items for her shop

loans.name: Lalelei

texts.en: Lalelei is 40 years old and married with 6 children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy a bag of flour, sugar, oil, and plastic bags. In the future, Lalelei hopes to extend her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a bag of flour, sugar, vegestable oil, tongs and spoon etc

loans.name: Laumata

texts.en: Laumata is a 51-year-old married woman with six children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu (a root vegetable) to earn a living. Laumata has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade. Laumata will spend her profits to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, a spade, etc

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith, who lives in Mombasa, Kenya, is a water vendor. She is married. She supplies water to her neighborhood; this idea came from the fact that there was a need for water delivery in the area. She began her water vending business six years ago, and she employs one extra person.

A loan of 83,450 KES will help Judith to purchase more water tanks and to install electricity in her premises.

In addition to the high cost of living all over, which has reduced the disposable income of many customers of businesses like hers, Judith has been facing the challenge of a lack of storage tanks. The latter problem will be solved by the purchase of water tanks with the capital from this loan.

She intends to apply for a water meter and sell water from a tap, in the future.

loans.use: To purchase more water tanks and to install electricity in her premises.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en: Filomena is a 23-year-old married woman with one child. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu (a root vegetable) to earn a living. Filomena has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade. Filomena will spend her profits to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives and spade etc

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a 49-year-old married woman with seven children. She would like to start growing cucumbers, peas, cabbages, tomatoes and pumpkin to earn a living. Maria has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade for her business. Maria will spend her profits to extend her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade

loans.name: Dúo Señor Esquipulas Group

texts.es:
DUO SEÑOR DE ESQUIPULAS 
ESTA FORMADO POR LA SEÑORA KIMBELY JOHANNA TIENE 26 AÑOS DE EDAD TIENE UN HIJO MENOR DE EDAD LA CUAL NO HACISTE ALA ESCUELA Y LE HACE COMPANIA ELLA INICIO SU NEGOCIO HACE 3 ANOS Y LES AGRADECE ALA FUNDACION POR LA OPOTUNIDAD QUE LES AN BRINDADO Y LE PIDE A DIOS Y A FAPE LAS PUEDAN SEGUIR APOYANDO CON SU NUEVO CREDITO ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ROPA, Y ESTA SOLICITANDO ESTE CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE MAS MERCADERIA EN ROPA PARA LA VENTA YA QUE NECESITA MAS CAPITAL PARA TRABAJAR.
texts.en:
Señor de Esquipulas Duo

Kimberly Johanna, 26, is part of this duo.  She has a minor son who does not attend school and keeps her company.  She started her business three years ago and thanks the Fundación for the opportunity it’s given her and asks God and FAPE to continue supporting them with a new loan.  She works selling clothes and is asking for this loan to buy more clothes to sell because she needs more working capital.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydeé de 30 años goza de la buena compañía de Yuri quien a sus 38 años ha logrado consolidar un hogar muy prospero. Es madre de la pequeña Britney de 9 añitos convirtiéndose en  el motivo de impulso y trabajo abnegado.
Es propietaria de una vivienda construida a base de adobe. Tiene por ocupación el cultivo de cacao orgánico, considerado uno de los productos más rentables de su localidad.
Lleva 5 años con dicha actividad desempeñándose con el apoyo de Yuri con quien gestiona todo lo necesario respecto a la producción y constantemente ponen ellos mismos la  mano de obra evitando realizar la contrata de jornaleros e incrementando las ganancias finales.
Consideran esta una actividad muy rentable puesto que las mazorcas de cacao actualmente gozan de un buen precio siendo así uno de los productos mas cultivados de momento , no obstante la presencia de lluvias al amanecer impide dirigirse a sus parcelas con normalidad  postergando sus actividades para el siguiente día.
Actualmente posee 3 cuadras con árboles de cacao considerados desfasados el cual necesitan ser reemplazados con injertos  o en todo caso podarlos y poner en su lugar plantas de almácigo.
Sus planes a futuro apuntan a la construcción de una vivienda para incursionar en un negocio propio con la intensión de brindarle a su pequeña una mayor atención. Desea contar con 3,000 nuevos soles los cuales serán invertidos en la compra de plantas de almácigo para el reemplazo de 3 cuadras de cacao con árboles antiguos , adicional a ello desea realizar la compra de sacos con abono orgánico para optimizar su producción.
texts.en:
Aydeé, 30, enjoys Yuri’s company who at the age of 38 has managed to establish a very prosperous home.  She’s the mother of little Britney, 9, who has become the main motivator for her hard work.  She owns an adobe house and her occupation is growing organic cocoa beans considered one of the most profitable products in her location.  She’s been in this activity for five years doing it with Yuri’s support; she negotiates everything with respect to production with him and they constantly provide the manpower thus saving the cost of hiring personnel and increasing their net profits.

She considers this to be a very profitable activity because the cocoa bean clusters currently command a very good price which makes them one of the most widely cultivated crops at the moment.  Sometimes rain at dawn keeps her from being able to do her work normally and she must postpone it until the next day.  She currently owns three ‘cuadras’ [unit of land measurement] planted with cocoa bean trees that are past their prime and they need to be replaced with grafts or they need to be pruned back and replaced with seedlings.

Her future plan points is aimed at building a new dwelling to start a new business of her own with the intention of providing her little girl with more attention.  She wants to have 3,000 new soles to buy seedlings to replace the three cuadras of old cocoa bean trees.  In addition to this, she wants to buy sacks of organic manure to optimize production.

loans.use: to buy seedlings.

loans.name: Dúo Amanecer De San Bartolo Group

texts.es: dúo Amanecer de San Bartolo. Este dúo está conformado por doña Hortencia ella tiene 54 años de edad y un hijo varón de 17 años, ella está solicitando el crédito para la inversión de su venta de productos por catalogo como   shampoo, desinfectantes, lociones, cremas que desde ya hace doce años  se dedica a este negocio, su anhelo en esta ocasión seguir manteniendo su negocio ya que con el tiempo gracias a dios a ido creciendo ya que de esa manera a sacado a su hijo adelante su propósito es que el siga estudiando y se prepare para tener  un día una mejor oportunidad de empleo,es por esa Razon que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos por catalogo,shampoo, desinfectantes, lociones, cremas, etc.
texts.en:
“Amanecer de San Bartolo” Duo

Hortencia, 54, is part of this duo.  She has a 17-year-old son and she’s asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of catalog products like shampoo, disinfectants, lotions and creams since she’s been in this business for 12 years now.  Her wish on this occasion is to continue keeping the business maintained since in time with God’s help it’s been growing and this is how she’s been able to support her son.  Her goal is that he continues with his schooling and prepares himself to someday have the opportunity for good employment.  For this reason she’s asking for this loan to buy catalog items like shampoo, disinfectant, lotion, cream, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Weena

texts.en:
Weena is 49 years old, a very humble mother of four.  She is a business-minded woman, and her main source of income is a rice mill. She has six months of experience in managing this business. For these months, she could say that she earned a good income and saved for the educational purposes of her children. 

Now, Weena is asking a loan of PHP 50,000 in maintenance of her rice mill machine and purchase more sacks of “palay” to grind. She is buying a lot of stock because her offered products are in demand. She wants to supply all her villagers with high quality but affordable kinds of rice. 

With these service, she hopes to generate more income and also satisfy her customers' needs. This may return her good income and good business. She hopes that her wish loan will be granted.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of her rice mill machine and purchase more sacks of “palay” to grind

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, steel, concrete blocks and stone to construct a wall around his home.

loans.name: Lucia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Lucia tiene 28 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene un hijo. Se dedica a realizar labores agrícolas desde hace varios años, oficio que aprendió de sus padres. Ella se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. a preparar el desayuno para su esposo, quien trabaja como jornalero, mientras ella labora en el cultivo y realiza los oficios domésticos. 

Ella compra los insumos agrícolas como el abono, semillas, veneno, etc. en una ciudad que esta a dos kilómetros caminando de su casa hasta el lugar en donde aborda un autobús que la traslade a la ciudad. El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar ganado para repasto. Con estos animales piensa trasladar su cosecha de maíz a su casa y así no tendrá que pagar por ese servicio. Ella piensa comprar más animales podrá producir leche.
texts.en:
Lucia, 28, has a spouse and a son.  She has worked in agriculture for several years, an occupation she learned from her parents.  She rises at 5am to make her husband breakfast; he works as a day laborer while she works in the fields and does domestic chores.

She buys her farm supplies like manure, seeds, poison, etc. in a city that’s a two-kilometer walk from her house to the bus stop for the bus that takes her to the city.  The loan she’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy grazing cattle.  She plans to use these animals to transport her corn crop to her house so she can avoid paying for this service.  She plans to buy more animals to produce milk.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Zahara

texts.en:
Zahara is a resident of the Malindi area, in Coast province, Kenya. She is a married business lady.  

Zahara owns a food business that she has been running for five years. Zahara began the business with money she earned and saved by working at casual jobs. In her business, she sells dried, raw mangoes and baobab. Both are used as seasonings in food, and when colored, they form sweet pods that are greatly loved in the coastal region.

Zahara learned about Milango from other clients of the institution. She joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve the operation of her business. The main business challenges she faces are the high cost of transport and price fluctuations. Zahara is applying for a loan of 41,850 Kenyan shillings to purchase baobab cobs and raw mangoes to use in making her products. 

The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings and used to improve her living standard. She aspires to own other business centers and to plan for her children’s education with much security. Also, she aspires to own a wholesale shop in the future.

loans.use: To purchase baobab cobs and raw mangoes.

loans.name: Odilia Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Odilia Isabel esta soltera, tiene 26 años de edad, ella obtuvo un diplomado de bachiller en ciencias y letras, se dedica a la confección de delantales típicos de diferente colores y diseños, inicio este trabajo siendo operaria en otro negocio y con el apoyo de su mamá inicia su propio negocio, hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en el negocio para la compra de materiales, telas, hilos, adornos, etc. quiere aumentar su producción y tener mejores posibilidades de venta, espera en el futuro tener una capitalización estable, y una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Odilia Isabel is a single 26-year-old woman who has a bachelor's degree in the humanities and sciences.  She has a business making aprons of different colors and designs.  She got her start in this working in another business, and with the help of her mother she started her own business. To date she has five years of experience.

She is seeking a loan so that she can invest in materials such as cloth, thread, adornments and other items.  She wants to increase her production and have greater opportunities to make sales.  She hopes to have a stable business in the future and an improved standard of living.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making aprons.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee de 30 años es catalogada como una madre muy abnegada, comparte una vida conyugal junto a Reynaldo y para complemento de la alegría familiar  sus dos pequeñas Michele y Mayli. Comparte sus vivencias familiares en una vivienda construida a base de adobe que adquirió conjuntamente con su pareja. Desde hace 14 años gracias a unas parcelas que recibió en calidad de herencia por sus padres tiene la satisfacción de haber sacado adelante a su familia conjuntamente con el apoyo de Reynaldo.
Durante todo el tiempo de trabajo tuvo la necesidad de contar con el apoyo de jornaleros cuya presencia es necesaria en el desyerbo  de campaña necesario para una producción de calidad ya que de no hacerlo de manera integral la mala yerba compite por los nutrientes naturales que poseen las parcelas.
Dado que la época lluviosa en la región beneficia en la producción de cacao orgánico desea contar con personal para el respectivo deshierbo de campaña y abono de las plantas jóvenes para el cual es necesario adquirir sacos de abono orgánico consistente en guano de isla.
Desea a futuro incursionar en un negocio propio ya sea una tienda de abarrotes para brindarle una mejor atención a sus pequeños y generar un ingreso paralelo a sus actividades agrícolas. Requiere contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico guano de isla así como el pago a los jornaleros del lugar para el deshierbo de maleza en sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Aide, 30, is a very self-sacrificing mother.  She shares her married life with Reynaldo and to add to their family joy their two little girls: Michele and Mali.  She shares their family experiences in a house built of adobe that she and her spouse bought together.  Thanks to some parcels she inherited from her parents 14 years ago she’s had the satisfaction of being able to support her family together with help from Reynaldo.

During all this time she’s worked she’s needed to hire day laborers whose presence is necessary to weed the fields to insure a quality harvest because if this isn't done properly the bad weeds compete for natural nutrients in the parcels.

Given that the rainy season in the area is beneficial for organic cocoa bean production she wants to have the necessary personnel to do the required weeding as well as manure for the young plants.  It’s necessary therefore to buy sacks of organic manure consisting of island guano.

In future she’s like to start a business of her own like a grocery store to provide better care for her little ones and generate income in addition to the activities in agriculture.  She needs to have 1,000 new soles to buy organic island guano as well as to pay the local day laborers to weed her cocoa bean crops.

loans.use: to buy organic manure and pay for day laborers.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia de 41 años comparte una vida marital con Alejandro de 43 años. Ambos padres de las pequeñas Ericka y Maydelin han logrado sacar adelante su hogar a base de mucho esfuerzo y trabajo. Posee una vivienda de adobe adquirida hace 15 años. Con el fruto de su esfuerzo logro junto a Alejandro adquirir unas parcelas para en adelante dedicarse a la producción de cacao orgánico y convertir dicha actividad en el principal sustento de su hogar.
Anteriormente se dedicaban a la venta de comida de manera ambulatoria, pero al no poseer la demanda necesaria optaron por cambiarse inmediatamente de rubro.
A medida que fueron dedicándose a las actividades agrícolas notaron que era muy rentable y lograron con el tiempo adquirir una parcela colindante para ampliar su producción.
Ella considera su actividad muy agradable puesto que esta al lado de Alejandro todo el tiempo y ello ha consolidado de manera positiva su relación.
Para la actual campaña productiva, desean realizar el reemplazo de árboles desfasados y proceder a usar los tallos para injertos, para ello es necesario contar con plantas de almácigo y abono orgánico guano de isla. A manera de agilizar las tareas desean contar con el apoyo de 2 jornaleros especialistas en el injertado de plantas.
Sus objetivos a largo plazo fijan la construcción de su vivienda a base de material noble para el futuro de sus familia y considera seguir trabajando con el entusiasmo que la caracteriza para hacerlo realidad. Requiere contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para la compra inmediata de plantas de almácigo, abono guano de isla y la contrata de jornaleros especialistas en el rubro del injertado esperando así iniciar una campaña mas de manera firme y con el buen financiamiento del caso.
texts.en:
Claudia, 41, shares her life with Alejandro, 43.  They are the parents of Ericka and Maydelin and have managed to move their home forward based on much effort and work.  She has an adobe house they acquired 15 years ago.  With the fruit of her and Alejandro’s efforts they managed to buy some parcels of farmland to start growing organic cocoa beans and turn this activity into their home’s main source of support.  They used to work selling food from place to place but demand was limited so they decided to immediately change over to this line of work.  As they started to get into agricultural work they noted that it was very profitable and in time were able to acquire an adjacent parcel to expand production.  She considers her work to be very pleasant because she’s at Alejandro’s side all the time and this has helped them solidify their relationship in a positive way.

For the current growing cycle, they want to replace trees that have outlived their productive cycle and use their trunks as hosts for grafts.  To do so, they must have seedlings and organic manure from the island.  To streamline these activities, they want to hire two day laborers who are specialists in plant grafting to help them.

Their long-term objectives focus on building their house with substantial building materials for their family’s future and she intends to continue working with her characteristic enthusiasm to make this reality.  She needs to have 3,000 new soles for the immediate purchase of seedlings, island guano and to hire day laborers who are specialists in this line of work grafting plants to start the growing cycle more strongly and well financed.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, bird guano and to hire expert day laborers.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Mercedes  tiene 58 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catalogo,  es promotora de productos de belleza ella vende de manera ambulante visitando instituciones públicas y privadas, barrios distintos domicilios ofreciendo sus productos, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Mercedes  va a usar este préstamo  para comprar cosméticos como cremas para la piel para tener en stock para su  negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es tener variedad de productos para  satisfacer a sus  clientes, La Sra. Mercedes  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son atender  con eficiencia a sus clientes y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse y salir adelante  sola.
texts.en: Mercedes, 58, has a business selling cosmetics through a catalog.  She is a beauty products promoter who sells door-to-door, visiting public and private institutions and homes in a number of neighborhoods to offer her products for sale.  This is the first loan that she has taken with the institution.  Mercedes will use this loan to buy cosmetics such as body creams to have in stock for her business.  She is taking this loan because she wants to have a variety of products to satisfy her customers.  Mercedes faces challenges in her business, including tending to her customers efficiently.  She will use the profits from this business to improve her family's quality of life, because this is the only activity that allows her to support herself and get ahead on her own.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics (creams)

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 50 years old and married with three children. She lives in Poblacion, Salug, Zamboanga del Norte.

Lourdes sells noodles, canned goods, and other items to earn a living. She has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP5,000 doing this type of work. Lourdes has requested a loan of PHP20,000 to purchase noodles, canned goods, and other items for resale.

Lourdes has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Lourdes hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, canned goods, and other items for resale.

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is 43 years old, married and has four children. She lives in Lopoc, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. To earn a living, Tita sells noodles, canned goods and other items. She has had this business for 14 years. Each month, she earns PHP5,000 doing this type of work. 

Tita has requested a loan of PHP10,000 to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items for resale. Tita has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Tita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items for resale.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela is married with 3 children. She is 47 years old and lives in New Bethlehem, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Marcela sells cigarettes, liquor, canned goods and other items to earn a living. She has had this business for 1 year. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase cigarettes, liquor and canned goods.

Marcela has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Marcela hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, liquor and canned goods.

location.town: Liloy-New Bethlehem, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Moises Elias

texts.es:
El señor Moises Elias está casado, tiene 24 años de edad, curso los grados de diversificado, con el titulo de administrador de empresas, actualmente trabaja para una organización en su comunidad, lleva 3 años en su labor como administrador, espera tener su propio negocio, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien es secretaria. 

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la apertura de una tienda de consumo en su hogar, ya que quiere tener otra fuente de ingresos, para así tener una mejor condición de vida, y contribuir al desarrollo de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Moises Elias is 24 years old and married.  He completed high school, and he is in business administration.  He currently works for an organization in his community.  He has worked as an administrator for three years.  He hopes to have his own business.  He has the support of his wife; she is a secretary.

He is requesting a loan that he will use to open a convenience store in his home.  He wants to do this to have another source of income, which is the way to have better living conditions and to contribute to the development of his community.

loans.use: to buy products for the store.

loans.name: Rosildes

texts.en:
Rosildes is married with 5 children. She is 60 years old and lives in Poblacion, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Rosildes sells noodles, canned goods and other items to earn a living. She has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 15,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5000 PHP to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items.

Rosildes has been a member of PMPC for a year. In the future, Rosildes hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items.

loans.name: Maria Lolita

texts.en:
Maria Lolita is 62 years old and married with eight children. She lives in Osukan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. To earn a living, Maria Lolita sells noodles, canned goods and other items. She has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP3,000 doing this type of work. 

Maria Lolita has requested a loan of PHP15,000 to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items for resale. Maria Lolita is a member of PMPC and joined this year. In the future, Maria Lolita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, canned goods and other items for resale.

loans.name: Dúo Las Torreliana Group

texts.es:
Duo torrelianas 
Maudelia es casada, tiene 3 hijos, se dedica a la venta de chicharrones tres veces a la semana y los otros días se dedica a la venta de vajillas de peltre planchas y sartenes por abonos en su colonia que esta ubicada en el municipio de villa nueva departamento de Guatemala, solicita el crédito para invertir ya que esta es una temporada en la que las ventas aumentan y la falta de capital le impide satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, agradece a dios la oportunidad que se le brinda para que ella pueda salir adelante ya que en estos tiempos es muy difícil tener un empleo para satisfacer las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en: Maudelia is married and has 3 children.  She has a business where she sells fried pork rinds 3 days a week.  On the other days, she sells pewter tableware, plates and pans on credit in her neighborhood, which is located in the Villa Nueva municipality of Guatemala.  She is requesting a loan to invest, because this is a good season for sales, and her lack of capital is preventing her from satisfying the needs of her customers.  She thanks God for being provided with this opportunity to get ahead, because in these times it's very difficult to have a job where she can satisfy the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy products for the home

loans.name: Andrea De Las Ángeles

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón, es un Pequeño Pueblo con muchas características agroecológica, es aquí donde habita la joven Andrea de los Ángeles. 

Andrea  es una madre soltera, con tres hijos bajo su cargo, todos estudian, a duras penas con lo poco que gana mantiene sus gastos de colegiaturas, pero son de sus sueños vivir en una mejor vivienda, brindarle a sus hijos también un mejor techo, se le presente la oportunidad de conocer a Ceprodel y Kiva que estos ayudan a este tipo de persona. 

Viendo que de gran Necesidad es mejorar su vivienda, solicita un crédito para la compra de: Cemento y arena, con esto sería de gran oportunidad poder mejorar las paredes de su casa, ya que por fenómenos naturales han sufrido mucho daño. 

 Agradece al gran Dios todo Poderoso, por haber conocido a Kiva y Ceprodel ya que son de sus sueños que estos le financien el crédito para poder vivir en una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Andrea de los Angeles lives in Rosa del Peñón, a small town interested in sustainable agricultural practices. 

She is a single mother with three children, all of whom attend school. With great difficulty because she earns so little, Andrea manages to pay for their school expenses. Her dream is to live in a better home so her children have somewhere decent to live. So she approached Ceprodel and Kiva as they help people like her.

As her greatest need is to make improvements to her house, Andrea is seeking a loan to buy cement and sand so that the walls of the house can be repaired. They were greatly damaged by severe weather.

Andrea thanks the all-powerful God for Kiva and Ceprodel since they have responded to her dream of money to pay for a better house to live in.

loans.use: buy cement and sand

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en: Phuong is a 35-year-old woman. She has one son. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband have been running a business selling clothes for seven years. Phuong would like to take a loan to buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that, through the loan, her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell

loans.name: Ramona

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Ramona works hard to support her family.

She has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing. Ramona is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for her tricycle.

Ramona has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Ganchuluun

texts.en:
Mrs.Ganchuluun is 48 years old lives with her husband and 2 children in a small house in the Orhon province of Mongolia. Her husband is a herdsman out of the city. Her daughter Eger, age 20, and son Gombojav, age 16, are both university students and they help their parents during their university breaks. 

Borrower has been running her tailoring business since 2006 at a rented counter in a local shopping area. She now operates her business at home taking orders from customers. She is requesting 2'500'000MNT to pay her children's university tuition and living expense. She is a hardworking, open-minded and friendly person.

loans.use: to pay her children's university tuition and living expense

loans.name: Marilin

texts.es: La Sra. Marilin  tiene 20, casada con dos hijos que son de las edades de 4 y 1 años,  ella   se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa, yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Junta Pirai,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  La Sra. Marilin  va a utilizar  este préstamo para la siembra de yuca y para la compra de un cerdito y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, La Sra. Marilin  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios Para mejorara la calidad de vida de la cliente y de su familia La Sra. Marilin  es una persona  responsable y trabajadora se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Marilin, 20, is married and has two children, ages 4 and 1.  She makes a living in agriculture growing a variety of vegetables such as potatoes, yucca, and corn on her plot of land in the community of Junta Pirai.

This loan is her second sequence with the institution.  Marilin's going to use it to grow yucca, buy a little pig, and prepare the land.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to get the resources for the planting and to be able to survive.

In her business Marilin faces weather challenges, which many times ruin the fields.  She's going to use the profits to improve her quality of life and her family's.

Marilin's a responsible and hardworking person.  She's grateful to the institution for its support.

loans.use: to grow yucca and to buy a pig

loans.name: Erdenechimeg

texts.en: Erdenechimeg is 37 years old. She lives with her husband and son in a rental apartment in Orhon Province, Mongolia. Her husband Jargalsaihan, 41, works at local gas station as an operator. Her son Dolgoon, 5, goes to a local kindergarten. The borrower has been working as saleswoman at a local market since 2007 and has built a close relationship with other salespeople, customers and suppliers. She is now planning to open her own clothing retail business in that market. Therefore, she is now requesting 3,900,000 MNT to purchase inventory from Erlian, China for her new business. She is hardworking, clever and well-experienced in business.

loans.use: to purchase inventory from Erlian, China for her newly started clothing retail business.

loans.name: Faafouina

texts.en: Faafouina is a 31-year-old married woman with 2 children. She would like to start growing taro, banana, yam and taamu to earn a living. Faafouina has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, bush knives and a spade for her farm. Faafouina will re-invest her profits to expand her business and save for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, bush knives and a spade for her farm

loans.name: Nurgul

texts.ru: Нургул 46 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей, один учится в школе, остальные помогают по хозяйству. В 1996 году в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Нургул начала свой бизнес в животноводстве. Благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду, Нургуль сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом 8,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы, 15 голов овец, 5 коз и одна кобыла. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нургул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на расширение хозяйства за счет покупки скота. Доходы от кредита Нургул планирует вложить в расширение хозяйства, а летом- отремонтировать дом.
texts.en:
Nurgul is 46 years old, married, and the mother of five children.  One of her children attends school, the others help around the business.  

In 1996, in search of a source of income for her family, Nurgul started her own animal husbandry business.  Thanks to her determination and hard work, she was able to develop her activity and she now makes a monthly income of 8,000 som (KGS).  Nurgul now owns two cows, 15 sheep, five goats and one mare.  

In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS).  This loan will help her to expand her activity through the purchase of livestock.  

Nurgul plans to use the earnings from her loan to expand her business, and when the summer comes, to repair her house.

loans.use: to purchase  some livestock.

loans.name: Romelle

texts.en:
Romelle is 41 years old, married and has three children. Two of her children are in school and she is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Romelle has an internet cafe business in the Philippines. Romelle has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase a computer set and other computer supplies.

Romelle has been in this business for nine years. In the future, Romelle would like to save enough money to buy land.

loans.use: to purchase a computer set and other computer supplies

loans.name: Florentina

texts.en:
Florentina is 72 years old and married with six children.

Florentina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items like canned goods, soft-drinks and other groceries.

Before this loan, Florentina has borrowed and paid 18 loans from NWTF. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Florentina aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items like canned goods, soft-drinks and other groceries

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina is 45 years old and married with three children. All of her children are in school.

Monina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested an 18,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy grocery products to sell in her store.

Monina has borrowed and paid 20 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from a cafeteria.

She dreams to save enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy grocery products to sell in her store

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигоре 31 года. Она замужем за музыканта. Нигора имеет 1 сына, которому 5 лет. Она добросовестная и порядочная женщина из хорошей семьи. Ее родители были не в состоянии дать Нигоре высшее образование. Она получила среднее образование и после замужества начала  работать, так как доход ее мужа маленький, и он не в состоянии обеспечить семью. В начале, Нигора работала в столовой официанткой. Это работа ей не нравилось, и она работала из-за зарплаты, вынуждая себя. После 2 лет она начала свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Благодаря хорошему сервису она имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Ее клиентки довольны ее работой, так как она очень аккуратная и коммуникабельная. Она хочет развивать бизнес дальше, а для этого она нуждается новой швейной машинки. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет и надеется на вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en:
Nigora, age 31, is married to a musician.  She has a son who is five years old.  She comes from a good family and is a conscientious and honest woman.

Nigora's parents were not in a position to give her a higher education.  So she married after high school and started working right away because her husband earns a small salary which is not enough to provide for the family.  In the beginning, Nigora worked as a waitress in a cafeteria.  She did not enjoy this work; she had to force herself to do it and only worked for the money.  After a period of two years, she started her own sewing business, making women's clothes.  Thanks to the high quality of her services, she now has her own regular customers.  Her customers are happy with her work because she is very neat and approachable.  

Nigora would like to further develop her business, and to do so she needs a new sewing machine.  She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy a sewing machine.  She is awaiting and relying on your kindness, and promises to repay her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Girlie

texts.en:
Girlie is 31 years old and married with three children.

Girlie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

Girlie has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from an Avon dealership.

Girlie aspires to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
As a married mother of eight children, Bernadeth works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending and pig-fattening businesses. Bernadeth is borrowing 22000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more soft drinks, canned goods and other groceries to sell.

Bernadeth has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, canned goods and other groceries to sell.

loans.name: Mila Rose

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Mila Rose works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from recycling materials. Mila Rose is borrowing 30000 PHP through NWTF to purchase snack foods, soap, shampoo and other groceries for her general store business.

Mila Rose has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase snack foods, soap, shampoo and other groceries.

loans.name: Margean

texts.en: Margean is from the village of Sto. Tomas. She is 40 years old and is married to Teodoro. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with two children. Margean is a responsible mother. She has engaged herself in a food selling business in their village as well as in the market. She has been running her business for over two years and earns a maximum of PHP 2,000 a week. Right now, Margean is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 12,000 to buy spaghetti, macaroni salad, "sopas" and "pancit" to sell. Margean hopes to grow her business and secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy spaghetti, macaroni salad, "sopas" and "pancit" to sell

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en: Andrea is married and has six children. She is 43 years old and lives in Carangan, Ozamis City. Andrea cultivates bananas for sale to earn a living and she has been in business for 3 years. Andrea earns 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP in order to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Andrea has been a member of GDMPC since 2007. In the future, Andrea hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario made herself busy through her sewing business. She is happily married to a farmer and blessed with three children. She has been engaged in this kind of business for 40 years. With the long period of time she has devoted to her sewing business, she has been able to improve the quality of the dresses she sews.

Rosario would like to grow he business continually, so she is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP. She will use this loan to buy stocks of garments, threads and necessary needles for her to minimize her expenses in going to and from the market. This will give her enough time to sew good quality dresses. In this way, she can satisfy her customers' demand, gain better profits and become popular a seamstress within her local community and nearby areas. Rosario hopes that she can get this loan so she can improve her family's living condition and save some for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy garments, threads and necessary needles for her sewing business.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en:
Ruben is married with 5 children. He is 64 years old and lives in Abordo, Ozamis City.

Ruben operates a general store, selling a variety of products to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for 5 years and every month he earns 3,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy more items such as eggs, noodles, shampoo, soap and toothpaste.

In 2010, Ruben joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. Ruben hopes to make improvements to his house for his family's benefit.

loans.use: to buy more items such as eggs, noodles, shampoo, soap and toothpaste.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
This is Rosita, 51, a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Rudy, a driver and an operator; they have five children. They manage their household while operating their business. She and her husband are working hard to provide income for their everyday expenses.

Rosita operates a mineral water station. She retails mineral water to her customers, selling them per 5-gallon container at a profit. Her customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 300 PHP in sales everyday.

She is requesting 12,000 PHP to help her continue her business. She will use the loan to upgrade her facilities and to buy additional containers to expand her business. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.

Rosita hopes that all her children will finish their studies and dreams of improving their quality of living. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a daily basis. A fellowship group gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loan.

loans.use: to upgrade her facilities and buy additional containers to expand her business.

loans.name: Dúo Los Eucaliptos Group

texts.es:
Duo  los Eucaliptos
 Elida es casada, tiene cinco hijos  de los cuales todos asisten al colegio cerca de su comunidad, tiene una venta de artículos de consumo diario, y gracias al primer crédito ahora vende ropa de paca  también en su domicilio, ella se siente muy bien ya que con las ganancias que obtiene en su negocio puede ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa ya que son una familia muy numerosa y en estos tiempos  cuesta mucho satisfacer las necesidades de la familia, ella solicita el crédito para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio,en la compra de productos comestibles y un poco de mercaderia en ropa para la venta.
texts.en:
Los Eucaliptos Duo

Elida is married and has five children, all of whom attend school near her community.  She sells everyday consumer products and, thanks to the first loan, now she also sells used clothing in her home.

She's doing well because with her profits from her business she can help her husband with the household expenses.  They're a large family and these days it costs a lot to meet the family's needs.

She's requesting the loan to continue investing in her business by buying groceries and a small amount of clothing merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy groceries and clothing to sell

loans.name: Rolly

texts.en: Rolly is from Segatic Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is 24 years old and single. To make a living, Rolly owns and operates a business venture in the agriculture sector, raising crops, particularly coconuts. Rolly been engaged in his business for 15 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month for this activity. In 2009, Rolly joined GDMPC. Rolly is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to financially support immediate members of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Herminio

texts.en: Herminio is married with three children. He is 52 years old and lives in Gango, Ozamis City. Herminio operates a service-based business, providing transportation to local community members. He has been doing this for six years; every month he earns 3,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 5,500 PHP to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Herminio been a member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Herminio hopes to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Dexter

texts.en: Dexter, 34 years old, is a married entrepreneur of Lapasan, Clarin with two children. He earns a living from his transport service business. He started it nine years ago and earns 5,000 PHP a month. To improve his business, he is borrowing 10,000 PHP from GDMPC micro-credit which he joined to obtain accessories and tires. He is hopeful of expanding his business before long.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires.

loans.name: Rosal

texts.en: Rosal, aged 38, works hard to support her family. She raises pigs. Rosal is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase of vitamins, feed and two more pigs. She hopes that it will be granted. Rosal would like to save for the future of her two children. She prays to improve her business with the loan in order to have a stable income. She could then help provide a good life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, feed and two more pigs.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en: Concepcion is a 47-year-old mother who aims to become successful and financially stable in the future. She has only one child and is separated from her husband due to unavoidable circumstances. Despite this, she has a strong determination to improve her living standards. She runs a small variety store in the market to generate income. She aims to improve her business to increase her income but she does not have enough capital. She is requesting an additional loan of PHP 7,000 to buy stocks of seasonings, beverages, canned goods, noodles and vegetables. She believes that this loan will enable her to improve the business and hopes that she will achieve her goals someday.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of seasonings, beverages, canned goods, noodles and vegetables.

loans.name: Maria Nena

texts.en: Maria Nena is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 51 years old, and married with two children. Maria Nena owns and operates a furniture-making business. She has had her business for three years from which she earns 8,000 PHP a month. In 2012, Maria Nena joined GDMPC. She is now requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP which she will use to purchase raw materials to manufacture new products and pay for labor costs. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to manufacture new products and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Dionisia

texts.en:
Dionisia raises hogs within her local community. She is 48 years old and married. She and her husband are blessed with four children.

Dionisia has raised hogs for 28 years. Her eldest child is married and the other three are still single. Dionisia also manages 8,000 sq. meters of rice field. Dionisia plans to purchase livestock feed and essential vitamins for her hogs with the loan of PHP 10,000. She believes that this loan will keep her hogs healthier and free of any unnecessary diseases. In this way, she can sell her hogs at a better price which will help her pay for her family's daily needs and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and essential vitamins for her hogs.

loans.name: Geovasco

texts.en: Geovasco is from Pan-ay Diot, Tudela. He is 24 years old. Geovasco is married and has one child. To earn a living, Geovasco grows bananas for sale. Geovasco has been in this business for three years and earns PHP 2,000 a month. Recently, Geovasco joined GDMPC and is now requesting a loan of PHP 4,500 to purchase farm supplies. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is from Malibangcao, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 29 years old and married with one child. Grace grows coconuts. During harvests, she will produce copra and then sell it. The coconut shells will be used to make charcoal. Grace has been in this business for three years and earns PHP 3,000 a month. In 2013, Grace joined GDMPC and is now requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase farm supplies and seedlings. She plans to improve and expand her agricultural business and hopes to open a sari-sari store one day.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies and seedlings.

loans.name: Ana Veronica

texts.es: Ana Verónica de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Dagoberto; ella posee una venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas y eso le ayuda a obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde su vivienda y de forma ambulante, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Ana es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan estar un paso mas cerca del éxito y no se rendirá hasta lograrlo por completo; en las ultimas semanas  aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Sandra Verónica tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena
texts.en:
Ana Veronica, 35, lives with her partner Dagoberto. She has a business selling clothing for men, women and children, and has gained a lot of sales experience which has helped her increase her earnings. Ana Veronica trades from her home and door-to-door her neighborhood. Her customers like her products due to the high quality, good prices and above all the excellent service.

Ana Veronica is an enterprising woman, who is dedicated to her work and eager to succeed. She is always on the lookout for new opportunities to enable her to be one step closer to success, and she will never give up. 

In recent weeks she has experienced increased demand and she wants invest in her business in order to take advantage of this. Therefore, she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase wholesale clothing. Ana Veronica has good repayment references and a strong moral character. She ensures that she will repay the debt and also has faith that she will be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothes

loans.name: Oyuntsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Oyuntsetseg, a 41-year-old widow, lives with her daughter in an old, small house in Hentii province, Mongolia. Her daughter, Uyanga, age 10, goes to a local school. Oyuntsetseg has been running a grocery store, at a counter she rents in a local market, since 2000. 

She has not been able to repair or make renovations to her house since her husband died, several years ago. Now, she is planning to insulate her house, in order to stay warm during winter. She is requesting a 6,000,000 MNT loan, which she will use to purchase construction and insulation materials to improve her housing situation. She is a hard-working and optimistic woman.

loans.use: to purchase construction and insulation materials, to use in renovations which will make it easier to keep her house warm in winter.

loans.name: Rosa Cristina

texts.es: Rosa de 57 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas afuera de un pasaje donde reside. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y con una fiel clientela que día a día la prefieren más. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, responsable y muy trabajadora.  Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales ya que para ella es muy importante que sus clientes queden satisfechos con el servicio que reciben, ya que de esta forma logrará mantenerlos contentos y  quedarán con ganas de regresar a su negocio. Rosa quiere hacer crecer su negocio por lo que llego a la conclusión que la mejor forma es solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la comprar de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de  tortillas como: maíz, además desea pagar una reparación de una plancha para pupusas.  Además de hacer mejoras en las instalaciones de su negocio, con esto espera ampliar su clientela y de esta forma aumentar sus ganancias y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Fifty-seven year old Rosa lives in her own house with her husband.  She makes her living making and selling tortillas outside of the corridor where she lives.  She has been doing this activity for many years; thus she has a lot of experience and regular customers that prefer her more every day.

She describes herself as an enterprising, responsible and very hard-working woman.  She has very good personal references.  It is very important to her that her customers are satisfied with the service they receive, since this is how she can keep them happy and keep them coming back to her business.

Rosa wants to grow her business, which is why she came to the conclusion that the best way is to apply to INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in buying the necessary ingredients for making tortillas, such as corn.  Furthermore, she wants to pay for repairing a pupusa griddle.  In addition to making improvements to her business installation, she hopes this will expand her clientele and therefore increase her earnings and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy the necessary ingredients to make tortillas, like corn, in addition to paying for repairing a pupusa griddle.

loans.name: Tsegmid

texts.en:
Mrs.Tsegmid is 54 years old and lives with her husband in a house in Niseh district, in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband, Natsagdorj, 54, helps his wife to run her small grocery store in town. Their children all are married and live separately from them. 

Tsegmid established a small grocery store, in a spare room of their house in town, in 1998. This business has been her family's only source of income, and with the profits she has paid all her children's tuition and has helped them to begin their own lives. 

She purchases organic dairy and meat products directly from herders, and sells the products to her local customers at retail prices. Now she is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase more organic dairy and meat products, to resell in her store. She is a hard-working, optimistic and welcoming woman.

loans.use: to purchase organic meat and dairy products, to resell in her grocery store

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es: María de 50 años de edad, vive junto a sus dos pequeños hijos. Quienes son su motor diario para seguir adelante y levantarse con nuevas esperanzas de vida con el deseo que no les falte nada el día de mañana y sea una madre ejemplar para sus hijos.  Ella se dedica a la venta de pescado gracias a su manera de ser con los clientes se han obtenido buenas referencias ya que opinan que es responsable, amable, atenta y muy trabajadora ya que es la única que trabaja en su hogar y la encargada que siempre sus hijos tengan que comer. María desea comprar  más materia prima es decir más pescados ya que también los clientes demandan tipos de pescados y ella no tiene el recurso para poder comprar todo lo que le pide,  es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de pescados, variedad es decir  boca colorada, lonja, atún, bagre, curvina entre otros así como también poder comprar una báscula más grande. Con alegría espera que este año sea bendecida como el anterior lo fue y recibir la ayuda que tanto anhela. Confía en Dios que seguirá siendo esa madre ejemplo que sus hijos ven cada día y podrá así cumplir sus expectativas.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old and lives with her two young children. They are her daily motivation for moving forward and getting up in the morning with new hopes for her life, and with the desire that they will not lack for anything and that she will be an exemplary mother for her children.

She works selling fish. Thanks to her manner with her customers, she has obtained good references from them, as they feel that she is responsible, kind, attentive, and very hardworking. She is the only one who works in her household, and she is responsible for her children always having something to eat. 

María wants to purchase more raw material – meaning more fish – because her clients ask for types of fish, and she doesn’t have the resources to purchase everything she is asked for. It’s for this reason that she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase fish, including snapper, lonja, tuna, catfish, and sea bass, among others, and also to buy a larger scale. She happily hopes that this year, she will be as blessed as in the previous one and receive the help that she has so wished for.

She trusts in God that she will continue being a mother who is an example that her children see every day, and that in this way, she will be able to fulfill her expectations.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fish, including snapper, lonja, tuna, catfish and sea bass, among others, and also to purchase a larger scale.

loans.name: Karina Patricia

texts.es: Karina de 26 años vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir como: blusas, faldas, camisetas, etc. Y también vende medicinas. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y de esta forma se ha ganado la vida ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es una mujer trabajadora, dedicada y emprendedora. Tiene muchas ideas de negocios las cuales  poco a poco va poniendo en marcha.  Para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el servicio que ofrece ya que reconoce que depende mucho de ellos y en la manera que los mantenga satisfechos continuaran frecuentándola y prefiriendo sus productos. Es por esta razón que ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir para surtir su negocio para  que los clientes encuentren siempre lo que busquen.  Dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para hacer la inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para hacer la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir como: faldas, blusas, pantalones, camisetas, y de más artículos que permitan atraer a más clientes.  Está convencida que con la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución logrará obtener buenos resultados de esta decisión y podrá mejorar sus ganancias las cuales le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Twenty-six year old Karina lives with her husband and two children.  She makes her living selling garments such as:  blouses, skirts, t-shirts, etc.  She also sells medicines.

She has been working in this business for many years and has made her living this way, since it is her primary source of income.  She is a hard-working, dedicated and enterprising woman.  She has many business ideas, which she is putting into practice little by little.  

For her, the most important thing is that her customers are satisfied with the service she offers, because she recognizes that she depends a lot on them, and that the way in which she keeps them satisfied will keep them coming back and preferring her products.  It is for this reason that she has decided to invest in her business by buying a variety of garments to stock her business so that her customers always find what they are looking for.

Since she does not have the necessary economic resources to make the investment, she has made the decision to apply to INTEGRAL for this loan to buy a variety of garments such as:  skirts, blouses, pants, t-shirts, and more items that will allow her to attract more customers.  She is convinced that with the help of God and this institution, she will get good results from this decision, and she will be able to improve her earnings, which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of garments such as:  skirts, blouses, pants, t-shirts, and more items that will allow her to attract more customers.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
To generate income, Yolanda engages in buying and selling of boiled corn, buko pie, and buko juice (coconut pie and juice) in the community. She is 57 years old and has three grown-up children.

She aims to improve the business and make it more profitable. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for loan capital of PHP 5,000. She will use it to enlarge her stocks of corn, buko pie, and buko juice. She believes that this financial assistance will enable her to improve the business. She hopes that she will make the business viable and profitable in the future.

loans.use: to enlarge her stocks of corn, buko pie, and buko juice (coconut pie and juice) for sale

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 39 years old, married, and has two children. She is from Guba, Clarin. To make a living, Vivian grows bananas to sell, which she has been doing for six years. She earns 4,500 PHP a month. 

Vivian joined GDMPC in 2012. She is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP, which she will use to obtain fertilizers to use for her banana plants. She plans to use the additional revenue generated by using the loan, to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to obtain fertilizers for her banana plants.

loans.name: Joanne

texts.en:
Joanne is from Maningcol, Ozamiz City. She is 36 years old. Joanne is married and has two children. To make a living, she owns and operates a transportation services business. She has been engaged in her business for three years and earns 4,000 PHP a month. 

In 2004, Joanne joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP, which she will use to repair an existing vehicle, for better service. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business, to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle, for better service.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina es originaria del municipio de El Sauce ubicado al occidente de León, es un pueblo bastante fresco porque está rodeado de montañas arborizadas donde se produce miel y leche.

Se siente muy orgullosa por ser Sauceña de nacimiento y de corazón, luchadora y trabajadora como todos los Sauceños.

Es una mujer con muchas virtudes que le ha tocado una vida dura, como madre soltera ha criado sus dos hijos sin el apoyo del padre, y como tal ha sido madre y padre a la vez. 

Desempeñando la labor de maestra de primaria lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar y le toca diario caminar 14 km para poder llegar a la comarca donde imparte clases, pero con amor siempre de enseñarles a los niños y más de estos lugares donde predomina la pobreza.

Esta mujer de 41 años es digna de admiración porque a pesar que su vida no ha sido fácil trata de ayudarles y ser responsable de la salud y alimentación de sus padres, por tal motivo está solicitando a los inversionistas de kiva que le financien un préstamo a través de Ceprodel para pagar la cirugía de su papá que actualmente está mal de salud.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is originally from the town of El Sauce located west of León.  It is a town with cool temperatures because it is surrounded by tree-lined mountains where they produce honey and milk. 

She feels proud to be a Sauceña (a person from El Sauce) from birth and in her heart. She is a hard worker and determined like all Sauceños. 

She is a virtuous woman that has had a hard life.  As a single mother, she has raised two kids without the help of their father and has been mother and father at the same time. 

Carrying out the duties as an elementary school teacher, she brings bread home every day and she walks 14 km daily to arrive to the region where she delivers classes.  With love she always teaches the children and more are from those regions where they are prodominately poor. 

This 41 year old woman is worthy of admiration because in spite of not having an easy life, she tries to help others and to be responsible for the health and diet of her parents.  For this reason she is asking the Kiva lenders to finance a loan through Ceprodel in order to pay for the surgery of her father who is actually in bad health.

loans.use: to pay for her father's surgery

loans.name: Gladis Guadalupe

texts.es: Gladis de 41 años de edad vive junto a su hijo de 15 años, siendo el su mayor orgullo y por el que día a día entregar lo mejor de sí. Actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de comida en un mercado de la zona donde reside cada mañana se levanta con nuevas expectativas de vida y con el ánimo de dar lo mejor en su negocio. Es muy visitada porque la comida que vende es muy rica y se ha hecho de clientes quienes la prefieren ya que también maneja precios accesibles, Gladis desearía que su negocio crezca un poco más es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de maíz, pollo, carne, arroz, tomates, lechuga, pepino, frijoles etc. Esta segura que si tiene más variedad de comida podrá vender más, y seguirá dándole una excelente calidad de vida a su hijo y confía que el día de mañana el vea el esfuerzo que su mamá hace a diario.
texts.en: 41-year-old Gladis lives with her 15-year-old son, who is her greatest pride and to whom Gladis devotes herself each day. She currently makes a living by preparing food in a market in the zone in which she lives. She gets up every morning with new expectations of life and with the goal of doing her best in her business. Her business is frequented because the food she sells is very delicious and she has built up a base of customers who prefer her business because her prices are reasonable. Gladis would like her business to grow a little more. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral so she can buy corn, chicken, meat, rice, tomatoes, lettuce, cucumber, beans, etc. She is sure that if she has a greater variety of food, she will be able to sell more. She will continue to give her son an excellent quality of life, and she trusts that in the future he will see the effort that his mama makes daily.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, rice, tomatoes, lettuce, cucumber, beans, etc.

loans.name: Mirna Guadalupe

texts.es: Mirna de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto con esposo y sus dos hijos. Su esposo tiene un negocio propio de taxis ubicado cerca en la zona donde vive y ella  posee una tiendita en la cual vende diversidad de artículos tales como: arroz, frijoles, golosinas,  azúcar, aceite, detergente, etc. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse al negocio y gracias a Dios y a su dedicación a logrado mantenerlo activo por todo este tiempo. Cabe destacar que no tiene un trabajo fijo y se dedica a cuidar y atender en la tienda.  Ella se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora y sobre todo muy emprendedora  y responsable ya que las metas que se propone siempre las alcanza con mucho éxito. Su sueño es ver su negocio florecer y lograr mejorar sus ingresos con el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. De acuerdo a lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su pequeña tiendita en la compra de mercadería  como: golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, detergente, café, leche, etc. De tal forma que su tienda siempre tenga todo lo que los clientes buscan y así poder alcanzar su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mirna is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their two children. Her husband has his own taxi business near the area where they live, and she has a small store where she sells a variety of items like rice, beans, candy, sugar, oil, detergent, etc. 

She has worked in this business for many years, and thanks to God and her dedication, she has succeeded in keeping it active for all this time. It’s important to point out that she doesn’t have a permanent job, so she works taking care of and attending to the store. 

She characterizes herself as being very hardworking, and above all very enterprising and responsible, since she always successfully achieves the goals that she sets. Her dream is to see her business flourish and obtain greater earnings, with the objective of improving her own quality of life and that of her family.

In accordance with the aforementioned, she has made the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in her little store through the purchase of merchandise such as: candy, sugar, rice, beans, detergent, coffee, milk, etc. In such a way, her store will always have everything that her customers look for, and therefore she will be able to achieve her dream of improving her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise like candy, sugar, rice, beans, detergent, coffee, milk, etc.

loans.name: Yeni Lisseth

texts.es: Yeni de 27 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que siempre ha velado por obtener grandes beneficios para ella y su esposo, es responsable con sus actividades y siempre trata de realizarlo todo a la perfección. Actualmente posee un negocio donde vende comida, gracias al carisma y la manera de preparar la comida se ha hecho de clientes y la prefieren por los diferentes platos de comida que vende, Ella desea incrementar más su negocio y ha pensado la forma de solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de granos básicos, ya que estos son necesarios y los que más ocupa como: Maíz, Frijol, Arroz, y comprar también pollo, verduras, carne, entre otros. Esta segura que venderá todo lo que se proponga y confía en Dios que le ayudara a seguir brindando un buen futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
27-year-old Yeni lives with her husband. She is a very hard-working woman who has always been on the lookout to obtain great profits for herself and her husband. She is very responsible in her activities and always tries to do everything to perfection. She currently owns a business where she sells food. Thanks to her charisma and her way of preparing food, she has built up a base of customers who prefer her business for the different dishes of food she sells. 

She wishes to grow her business and thought to request a loan from Apoyo Integral so she can buy staple foods, such as corn, beans, and rice, since these are necessary and are what she mostly uses. She will also buy chicken, vegetables, and meat, among other things. She is sure that she will sell everything that she offers and she believes that God will help her to continue giving her family a good future.

loans.use: to buy staple foods, such as corn, beans, and rice, as well as chicken, vegetables, and meat, among other things.

loans.name: Lodgenia

texts.en: Lodgenia's main source of income comes from planting and harvesting corn to sell. She is 54 years old, a widow and has four children. She is from Malibangcao, Clarin and has been in farming 25 years, earning an amount of 6,000 PHP a month. In 2007, Lodgenia joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Eneyancy  Salvadora

texts.es: Eneyancy de 37 años de edad, habita junto a su familia su compañero de vida y sus hijos.
