Es una mujer muy emprendedora, trabajadora, responsable que jamás se ha dejado vencer por las adversidades le que le presenta la vida. Actualmente Eneyancy se dedica a la venta y elaboración de hamacas, junto a su familia posee este negocio que por años ha hecho que se mantengan y que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día. Eneyancy desea seguir elaborando hamacas ya que se ha hecho de clientes por el bonito arte que elabora pero lastimosamente la maquina con las que las elabora se le ha arruinado y no tiene el fondo suficiente para repararla es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para mandar a reparar un torno, la máquina que es la que por años ha tenido en su negocio, y a su vez comprar telas para elaborar las hamacas, diferentes hilos y agujas. Teniendo esta ayuda ella podrá mejorar su vivienda y tendrá la satisfacción que en su hogar siempre tendrán el sustento diario.
texts.en:
Eneyancy, 37, lives with her partner and their children. She is a very enterprising, hardworking and responsible lady who has never let herself be defeated by the adversities that life presents. Currently, Eneyancy produces and sells hammocks. She has been working in this business with her family for many years to earn their daily bread. 

Eneyancy has gained customers due to the beautiful artwork she creates, and wants to continue to produce hammocks. Unfortunately, the machine that she uses to produce her hammocks has broken down, and she does not have enough funds to repair it. Therefore Eneyancy has requested a loan via INTEGRAL to repair the lathe, which she has used in her business for years. She will also purchase fabrics to make hammocks, and a variety of threads and needles. With this assistance, Eneyancy will be able to improve her home and be secure knowing that her family will always have their daily bread.

loans.use: to repair the lathe, the machine which she has had in her business for years, and to purchase fabrics to produce hammocks as well as various threads and needles.

loans.name: Erick Alexander

texts.es: Erick de 26 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y su pequeña hija. Es un hombre responsable, honesto y sincero que su mayor ilusión es darle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente Erick trabaja como motorista de su microbús, transportando personal por las noches, es así como se gana la vida honradamente cada mañana despierta con nuevas ilusiones y deseos de superación y sobre todo la satisfacción que su hija le agradecerá todo el esfuerzo que hace hasta el día de hoy. Se siente con una gran responsabilidad ya que es el único que trabaja en su hogar y se ve en la obligación de llevar el sustento diario.  Erick ha tenido problemas con su microbús y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para hacerle ajustes y reparaciones, cambio de aceite, compra de bujías, llantas nuevas entre otros. Espera que La ayuda solicitada le llegue a tiempo y así podrá seguir siendo el padre y esposo ejemplar que ha sido siempre.
texts.en:
26-year-old Erick lives with his wife and young daughter. He is a responsible, honest and sincere man whose greatest dream is to give the best to his family. Erick currently works as a minibus driver, providing private transport at night. This is how he makes an honest living, and he wakes up every morning with new dreams and a desire to excel. He is particularly happy that his daughter will benefit from all the effort he has been making to date. 

Erick feels a great responsibility because he is the only working family member, therefore he must provide their daily bread. Erick has experienced some problems with his minibus and is asking for a loan with INTEGRAL in order to be able to make adjustments, repairs, and oil changes, and to purchase new spark plugs, tires and so on. He hopes that the requested loan will will arrive on time, so that he can continue to be the exemplary father and husband that he has always been.

loans.use: to make adjustments, repairs, and oil changes, and to purchase new spark plugs, tires and so on.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more green mangoes to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Pilar

texts.en: Pilar is 41 years old and has two children. Pilar keeps busy managing a food business, primarily selling frozen foods. She is working hard to boost the family income and to lift her children from living poor. Pilar has been engaged in her business for two years and earns a maximum of about PHP 1,500 a week. She is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase hot dogs, "langgonisa" (sausages) and "toccino" (bacon) to sell. She hopes that with the help of this loan, she will reach her desired net income and be able to save for her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase hot dogs, "langgonisa" (sausages) and "toccino" (bacon) to sell.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en: Albert is a responsible father who wants to give his family a better life. He is 43 years old and currently raising his family in a rural community. Due to financial difficulty, he was engages in raising fingerlings (potatoes) to generate additional income. He planned to raise more fingerlings for sale but lacks sufficient capital. To work out his plan, he is asking for an additional loan of PHP 32,000.00 to buy the needed feeds and additional fingerlings to raise. Through patience and hard work, he believes that he will improve the business and increase his income to support the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy feeds and additional fingerlings to raise.

loans.name: Tsermaa

texts.en: Tsermaa is 30 years old lives with her husband and two children in a house in Hentii province of Mongolia. Her husband Bolorchuluun works at a local private construction company as an assistant worker. Her daughter Uurintuya, age 10, goes to local school and son Bumbayar, age 3, is ready to start kindergarten. Tsermaa had stayed home till her son was old enough to go to kindergarten.  She is planning to fix his husband's car to start providing taxi service in town. She has been driving a car for years and she knows the town very well. She is now requesting 3,000,000MNT to purchase spare parts and tires to fix her husband's car to start her taxi service business. She is a hardworking, modest and positive person.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and tires to fix her husband's car to start her taxi service business

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru:
Людмила  -  женщина фермер. С 2003 года занимается выращиванием огурцов  и помидоров.
Справляться по хозяйству ей помогает муж и 28 - ми летний сын.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с  выращивания молодых огурцов в открытом грунте.
Людмила решила приобрести пленку для перекрытия теплицы для защиты огурца и помидора от холода и ветра.
В планах на будущее:  увеличить посадку огурцов и помидоров.
В личных планах: достроить дом для проживания.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки для теплицы.
texts.en:
Ludmila is a farmer. Since 2003, she has been cultivating cucumbers and tomatoes. Ludmila's husband and her 28-year-old son help her with the business. She started her farming activity by growing cucumbers in an open field.

Ludmila has decided to purchase plastic film to re-cover her greenhouse and protect her cucumbers and tomatoes from cold and wind. In the future, she plans to expand the planting of her vegetables. Ludmila also hopes to finish constructing her family's new house. Presently, she needs your help to finance the purchase of plastic greenhouse cover.

loans.use: to purchase plastic film for her greenhouse

loans.name: Sergey

texts.ru:
Сергей  - фермер. С 2003 года занимается выращиванием огурцов, помидоров и поздних томатов.
Справляться по хозяйству ему помогает супруга и старший сын,которому 12-ть лет, он учится в школе.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с одной теплицы, где выращивали молодую капусту.
Сергей с супругой решил приобрести пленку для перекрытия теплицы и защиты огурца и помидора в зимний период от холода и ветра.
В планах на будущее:  расширить посадку ранних томатов.
В личных планах: обеспечить детям образование.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки для теплицы.
texts.en:
Sergey is a farmer. Since 2003, he has been growing cucumbers and different types of tomatoes. In running his business, Sergey receives help from his wife and their eldest son, who is 12 years of age and attends school. Sergey started his farming business with a single greenhouse used for cultivating cabbage.

Sergey and his wife have decided to purchase plastic film to re-cover their greenhouse and protect the cucumbers and tomatoes from cold and wind. In the future, he would like to expand the planting of early tomatoes. As a father, Sergey wants to provide his children with quality education. Presently, he needs your help to finance the purchase of plastic greenhouse cover.

loans.use: to purchase plastic greenhouse cover

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish repairs in his apartment

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 54 years of age, married, and has five children. Her priority in life is to give her children a better quality of living. Her only way of doing this is to send her children to school and ensure they are able to attain education at the college level. Rosita shares that she does not have any valuables to give to her children. This is why she is striving to educate them.

Rosita has been running a hog-raising business for 15 years while her husband has been growing rice in their field. At present, the price of hog's feed in the market has increased. She is therefore asking for a loan of 50,000 PHP to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs. She hopes to operate the business for as long as she can manage, and to continue to financially support her children's needs in school.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.name: Joemar

texts.en:
Joemar's business is raising hogs, just like many other entrepreneurs in his village. He patiently raises hogs and resells them upon maturity. Joemar is 37 years old. He is married with four children. 

Joemar wants to raise more hogs. For this reason, he is now asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to keep growing healthy hogs. He will buy feed and vaccines to nourish them. In the future, Joemar hopes to keep improving his sales and earn funds to be used for emergency purposes.

loans.use: buy feed and vaccines to nourish his hogs.

loans.name: Oyunbileg

texts.en: Mrs Oyunbileg is 43 years old. She lives with her husband and two children in a house in Dornogovi Province of Mongolia. Her husband Adiyazabar works at a mining company as an electronic engineer. Her son, Erdenebileg, aged 21, works in the Mongolian railway as an assistant driver and her daughter Ichinhorloo, age 15, studies at the local secondary school. Mrs Oyunbileg opened a small groceries store in their spare room in 2010. She and her husband paid their son's university tuition using their salary and business profit. Her daughter plays checkers and is now going to Malaysia to attend the Asian Championship. Mrs Oyunbileg is requesting 1,600,000 MNT to pay for her daughter's Asian Championship trip expense. She is an open-minded, welcoming and hardworking person.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's Asian Checkers Championship trip expense.

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es: Ana Elizabeth de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su hermana y su sobrina en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, leche, pan, jabones, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda esta ubicada en su vivienda en una comunidad muy transitada de personas , ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque es la tienda mas surtida con productos de calidad, a muy buenos precios y además con un servicio excelente; Ana es una mujer emprendedora, activa, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le abran camino al éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Ana Elizabeth  tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable se siente muy agradecida con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Elizabeth is 48 years old and lives with her sister and niece in their own house.  She has her own shop where she sells basic commodities - basic grains, milk, bread and soap, among other things.  She has had the business for a few years now and has a lot of experience in sales, allowing her to earn a good profit.  The shop is located in her home in a community that has many people passing through it.  Ana Elizabeth has a lot of customers because people prefer her shop as it is always stocked with quality products sold at good prices and, plus, the service is excellent.  Ana Elizabeth is an active and enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work.  She really wants to move forward in life and is always looking for new opportunities that will take her along the path to success.  Like any good shopkeeper, she wants to expand the business but she needs more investment.  So, for this reason, she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, candy, instant products, drinks and soaps, as well as other products.  Ana Elizabeth has a good credit rating and is very responsible.  She is very grateful for the help she has received and assures us that she will be able to pay off her debt and, at the same, she will be able to provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, instant products, drinks and soaps.

location.town: Santa Tecla, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel de 35 años de edad, reside junto a su madre. Es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser ejemplo en su hogar ya que cada mañana despierta con nuevas ilusiones y deseos de superación para ser un buen ejemplo.  Actualmente Miguel tiene una pequeña tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como leche, huevos, golosinas entre otros y también vende perfumes, talcos y cremas.  Gracias a Dios posee de clientela ya que por la manera de ser y atender a los clientes lo prefieren está muy contento porque día a día se ha ido superando, Miguel desde hace un tiempo desea ampliar su única fuente de trabajo y tener un poco más surtida la tienda es por eso que decidió  acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder abastecer más su tienda comprando más producto como queso, pan de dulce, cereales, papel higiénico, sopas entre otras. Agradece a todas esas personas que de buen corazón desea ayudarle y les asegura no defraudarlas.
texts.en: Miguel is 35 years old and lives with his mother.  He is very hard-working and is always setting a good example at home as every morning he wakes up with new dreams and desires for prospering.  Miguel currently has a small shop where he sell basic commodities such as milk, eggs and candy, among other things.  He also sells perfumes, talcum powder and creams.  Thanks to God he has a good customer base because customers like his his way of being and of attending to them.  He is very happy because every day he is doing well.  For some time Miguel has wanted to expand his only source of work and to have the shop a little better stocked.  For this reason, he decided to come to Integral to apply for a loan.  With it he can stock up his shop by buying products such as cheese, sweet bread, cereals, toilet paper and soups, among other things.  He is grateful to all the good-hearted people who want to help him and he promises not to cheat them.

loans.use: to buy cheese, sweet bread, cereals, toilet paper and soups, among other things.

loans.name: Cruz Antonia

texts.es: Cruz de 32 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, es una mujer muy comprometida con sus labores diarios que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un buen madre ejemplar y esposa de admirar. Actualmente Cruz tiene un pequeño negocio de comercializar y tiene crianza de pollos y gracias  Dios le ha ido bien desde que comenzo con el negocio ella desea ampliar más su negocio y comercializar mas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de concentrado para engorde y compra de pollos, busca la manera de sobresalir en la vida y cree que esta es la manera ya que es la única fuente de ingreso que tiene agradece a Dios y a las personas de buen corazón que jamás la han dejado sola y espera así cumplir sus expectativas. Y seguir brindándole un buen futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Cruz, 32, lives with her husband and children and is very committed to her daily job of being a good mother and adoring wife.  She currently operates a small chicken business, which has been going well since she began, and wants to expand her business and sell more.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy chicken feed and chickens.

She seeks ways to get ahead in life and believes her work is the way to do this, since it is her only source of income.  She thanks the Lord and the people of good will who have never left her alone, in the hope she can reach her goals and continue giving her family a bright future.

loans.use: To buy chicken feed and chickens.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.en: Orlando, aged 40, works hard to support his family. He has a piggery business. He is requesting a loan of 27,000 PHP to purchase vitamins, feed and three more pigs. He has been in this business for more than a year now. In the future, Orlando would like to save for the future of his three children. He prays for the growing of his business through the loan in order to have a stable source of income. He could then also soon offer an improved standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and feed, and three more pigs.

loans.name: Silia Nohemy

texts.es: Silia de 24 años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijos, habitan en su casa propia que está en buenas condiciones ya que ella desde un principio se preocupó porque sus hijos vivieran en lo mejor que les pudo haber dado. Es muy trabajadora y emprendedora siendo la responsable que en su hogar no falte el sustento diario y ha buscado la forma de que sus hijos no pasen necesidades mayores. Se dedica a la venta de punches es decir cangrejos y pescado, no tiene mayor competencia ya que es la única que los vende por su casa y siempre prefieren y a comprarle mariscos a ella ya que tiene carisma para la venta y los clientes se quedan satisfechos con la compra. Silia desea que su negocio crezca es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra demás mariscos como: pescados, cangrejos, camarones de rio y camarones grandes, lo que ella busca es que su negocio no se quede en pequeño si no que vender cada vez más y más, espera y confía en Dios que la ayuda que solicita sea dada y agradece a las personas de buen corazón que le brindaran una mano para ella tener en buenas condiciones de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Silia is 24 years old and lives with her two children.  They live in their house which is in good condition because, right from the beginning, Silia made sure to look after the house so that the children could live in the best conditions that she could offer them.  Silia is hard-working and enterprising and the breadwinner in her house.  She makes sure that there is nothing lacking in the house and she finds a way to make sure her children do not suffer greater hardships.  Silia sells crabs and fish and has no major competition as she is the only one to sell these products near her house.  People choose to come to Silia and buy seafood from her because she is a charismatic sales-woman and customers are left satisfied with their purchases.  Silia wants her business to grow so she is applying for a loan from Integral to buy more seafood such as crabs, river shrimp and big shrimp.  What Silia wants is for her business not to stay small but to sell more and more.  She hopes and has faith in God that the help she has applied for will be given and she thanks all those with good hearts for offering a helping hand to give her children a good life.

loans.use: to buy more seafood such as fish, crab, river shrimp and large shrimp.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es: Rosa Angélica de setenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su nieta Emilia en  casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad frijoles, pan, huevos, bebidas, jabones entre otros, ya tiene amplia experiencia en las ventas lo que le permite obtener siempre muy buenas ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela,  tiene ventaja porque no hay mucha competencia en los alrededores,  la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a excelentes precios, además el servicio es muy bueno; Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora siempre dispuesta a cumplir todas las oportunidades que se le presentan para así  alcanzar el éxito, uno de sus más grandes sueños  es acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un credito que le permita comprar granos básicos, ´productos instantáneo, pan, golosinas, queso, verduras etc. Rosa Angélica tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable esta muy agradecida con la ayuda y  sabe que podrá cancelar la deuda,  al mismo tiempo que le dara a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa Angélica, 70, lives with her common-law husband and granddaughter, Emilia, in their own house.  She has a grocery store where she sells all kinds of stape goods, such as beans, bread, eggs, beverages, soap, etc.  Her vast sales experience allows her to make a good profit.  The store is located in her home and is very well-known in the area, by her many customers.  There is not much competition in the area, which is an advantage for the store, and people prefer her location because they can always find quality, low priced products and very good service.

Rosa is a hard worker who is always looking for opportunities to be successful.  One of her greatest goals is to expand her business, but she is lacking capital.  Therefore, she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy staples such as instant products, bread, sweets, cheese, vegetables, etc.  Rosa Angélica has a good credit record and is very responsible.  She is very grateful for the help and knows she can pay back the loan.  Meanwhile, she is giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy staples such as instant products, bread, sweets, cheese and vegetables.

loans.name: Bergelyn

texts.en:
Bergelyn is married and has two children. Bergelyn is 29 years old, and resides at Masabud, Clarin. Bergelyn owns and operates farm land. She plants and harvests rice for sale to earn a living and she has been in this business for 4 years. Each month, she earns 6,000 PHP doing this type of business. She has requested for a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.  

Bergelyn joined GDMPC in 2012. In the future, Bergelyn wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Nubia Del Carmen

texts.es: Nubia del Carmen de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su familia en casa propia; ella posee una sala de belleza donde ofrece sus servicios y además vende productos de belleza cosméticos, cremas perfumes entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, trabaja desde su vivienda y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que venden es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Nubia es una mujer  activa, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora todos los días se esfuerza por trata de cumplir sus sueños sabe que solo con constancia y amor al trabajo podrá alcanzar ese éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos, tijeras, secadora, plancha etc. Nubia del Carmen tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Nubia del Carmen, 35, lives with her family in her own house.  She runs a beauty salon and sells cosmetics, creams, perfumes, etc.  She has been in business for several years, and the vast experience gained allows her to make a better profit.  She works at home and has a loyal customer base which prefers her salon because she sells top quality products at low prices, while also offering an unequaled customer service.

Nubia is an active woman who is dedicated to her job, working hard every day to meet her goals.  She knows that only through consistency and love of work can she reach success.  Over the last few weeks there has been much product demand so she wants to restock the business.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy cosmetics, scissors, a hair dryer and iron, etc.  Nubia del Carmen has a good credit record and is very responsible.  She promises to pay back the loan and is confident she can give her family a better life.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, scissors, hair dryer and iron.

loans.name: Maira Aracely

texts.es: Maira de 32 años de edad habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de venta de ropa y aparte vende curtido con chile .Es muy trabajadora y emprendedora muy conocida por sus vecinos po lo responsable y buena gente que es. Desde hace algunos años decidió poner su negocio  de ropa, dado que los ingresos percibidos por su esposo no son suficientes para cubrir el gasto de las principales necesidades de su hogar. Es así como cada día se levanta muy temprano para realizar todas las tareas del hogar, atender  a su familia y velar por su negocio. Muchas personas la prefieren  ya que es una mujer muy amable y responsable, pero lo más importante es que los clientes siempre encuentran lo que buscas  a los mejores precios. Su sueño es poder incrementar su inventario para poder aumentar sus ventas de tal forma que pueda incrementar sus ingresos y de esta forma poder ayudar de mejor  manera a su familia. Esta es la razón por la cual ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar este préstamo el cual utilizará para invertir en la compra de  variedad de prendas de vestir  tales como: faldas, blusas, camisetas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc. de esta forma espera cumplir su sueño y confía en Dios todo poderoso que así será.
texts.en:
Maira, 32, lives with her husband and children.  She sells clothing and cured chili peppers.  She is a hard-working, enterprising woman who is known among her neighbors as being very responsible and a good person.  For several years she has been running her clothing business because her husband's income is not enough to cover the main household expenses.  Every day she gets up early to do the housework, attend to the family and look after the business.

Many people prefer her services because she is kind and responsible, but they especially like the fact that they can find what they are looking for at the best price.  Her goal is to increase her stock and sales volume so she can help her family better.  This is why she decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL to buy a variety of clothing, such as skirts, blouses, t-shirts, pants, underwear, etc.  This, and her trust in God, will help her reach her goal,

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothing such as skirts, blouses, t-shirts, pants, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel es un hombre muy responsable y  honrado quien desea darle todo lo mejor a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y cuatro hijos menores de edad. Él es una persona que trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante su hogar. Daniel trabaja como agricultor y así mismo comprando y comercializando granos básicos como frijoles y maíz. Daniel sale todos los días muy temprano para vender en diferentes parques  y plazas centrales,  con lo que logra comercializar todo su producto, gracias a su enorme esfuerzo y dedicación. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más granos básicos con lo que  podrá cumplir su meta de mejorar sus ganancias de manera que brinde lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: Daniel is a very responsible, honest man who wants to give his family the best he can.  He works hard to provide for his wife and four children.   Daniel is a farmer, and also buys and sells basic grains such as beans and corn.  Every morning, he goes out to the central parks and plazas to sell his products with enormous effort and dedication.  He is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to have the money he needs to buy more basic grains.  This will allow him to earn more so he can give his family the best life possible.

loans.use: To buy basic grains to sell.

loans.name: Nuria Del Carmen

texts.es: Nuria de 48 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y seis hijos de los cuales dos están casados y viven juntos en la misma casa.  Nuria al igual que su esposa y sus dos hijos mayores se dedica a trabajar muy duro para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Nuria trabaja vendiendo frutas y verduras sobre la calle principal de una colonia muy populosa, lo que es muy ventajoso para ella ya que gran parte de las personas que transitan por el lugar son sus clientas, por lo que Nuria desea tener su venta muy surtida con diferentes productos alimenticios. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda comprar diferentes frutas de estación, así mismo diferentes verduras, con esto Nuria espera aumentar sus ventas y así mejorar su estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Nuria, 48, lives with her husband and six children, two of whom are married but still live at home. She and her husband, along with their two eldest children work very hard to provide an income for the household.  Nuria sells fruit and vegetables along the main street in her busy residential area.  Many of the people in the area are her customers, so she wants to have a variety of products to sell.

She is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy different seasonal fruits and vegetables.  Nuria wants to increase sales and improve her economic stability.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Claudia Estela

texts.es: Claudia de 37 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto con su esposo e hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de inflables y tienda desde hace ya varios años. Su negocio está  ubicado en su hogar el cual ha sabido adecuar de tal manera que sea atractivo para los clientes. Es una mujer muy emprendedora  y dedicada en su trabajo, ya que este genera ingresos que ayudan a su esposo para suplir las necesidades de su hogar. Tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio,  lo cual le ha permitido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona los cuales cada día lo prefieren más.  Su deseo es seguir recibiendo los frutos de su negocio por lo que ha decidido invertir  en la compra de mercadería al por mayor ya que desea ser la mejor y más surtida de su zona. Esta es la razón por las cuales se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un préstamo  ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios que le permitan realizar la inversión. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería de infables, y flotadores .Con el fin de mantener surtido el negocio que le permita atraer a más clientes  que le generen mayores ganancias y  pueda  junto a su esposo dar a sus hijos educación y una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Claudia, 37, lives with her husband and chidlren.  She has a store and sells inflatable devices, having been in business for several years.  She works from home which makes it more attractive for customers.  She is a very enterprising, dedicated woman who earns an income to help her husband cover the household expenses.  She has a lot of business experience which has allowed her to earn peoples' confidence in the area, making them loyal customers.

She hopes to continue running a successful business and has decided to buy more wholesale merchandise so she can have the best stocked store.  Therefore, she requested a loan through INTEGRAL because she does not have the economic resources needed for this investment.  She will use th eloan to buy inflatable and floating devices.  This will help attract mroe customers so she can sell more.  She and her husband want to give their children a good education and a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy inflatable, floating devices.

loans.name: Marcos Tulio

texts.es: Marcos de 33 años de edad,  se dedica a la comercialización  de verduras, frutas y huevos de una forma muy peculiar ya que no contaba con los recursos para comprar un pick up y movilizarse de forma que pudiera transportar mayor cantidad de productos, él creo una bicicleta con una estructura metálica en la cual pudiera movilizar más verduras entre otros productos. Marcos vive junto a su esposa quien le ayuda con el negocio y así mismo junto a dos pequeños hijos ambos menores de cinco años. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de verduras, frutas, huevos y así mismo incorporar otros productos más como detergentes y desinfectantes, con esto Marcos está muy  seguro que mejorará sus ingresos considerablemente y de esta forma vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Marcos, 33, sells vegetables, fruits and eggs in a peculiar way since he did not have the money to buy a pick-up to transport more products.  He built a metal structure around his bike to transport more vegetables and other products.

Marcos lives with his wife who help with the business.  They have two children under five years old.  He is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy more vegetables, fruit, and eggs, as well as other products such as detergents and disinfectants.  Through this endeavor, he is sure he can increase his income considerably and live a better lifestyle with his family.

loans.use: To buy eggs, fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Alexander

texts.es: Carlos Alexander de veintiséis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida Doris y su hija Karla en casa propia; él se dedica a la  reparación de calzado y tiene varios años con el puesto  se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el servicio lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, ya tiene mucha clientela y las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Carlos es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y todo un soñador, todos los días lucha por cumplir cada una de sus metas, para él lo mas importante es su familia por eso lucha por darles un lugar seguro para vivir, en los últimos meses la casa ha tenido deterioros y necesita reparación para la seguridad y comodidad de todos necesita de materiales es por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillo, tejas, herramienta etc. Carlos Alexander tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos Alexander, 26, lives with his common-law wife, Doris, and their daughter, Karla, in their own house.  He repairs shoes for a living and has been in business for several years, gaining enough experience to improve his earnings.  He has many loyal customers who like the quality and low prices of his good customer service.  Carlos is an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work and goals.  Every day he strives to meet every one of his goals.  

Family is the most important thing for him, so he tries hard to give his family a safe place to live.  Over the last few months the house has suffered deterioration and is in need of some repairs.  That's why he needs the materials for the project and has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy cement, bricks, tiles and tools.  Carlos Alexander has a good credit record and is very responsible.  He promises to pay back the loan, while also giving his family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, tiles and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dough, beans, staples, sodas and other items.

loans.name: Jose Tomas

texts.es: José de 48 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos por quienes trabaja muy duro para darles lo mejor que le sea posible. José se dedica a diversas actividades como atender su pequeña tienda de productos perecederos, así mismo se dedica junto a su esposa a elaborar comida y venderla en fábricas con los empleados, y también trabaja como agricultor sembrando café, con todo esto él demuestra sus enormes deseos de tener una vida mejor y salir adelante. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL  para poder comprar una motosierra y talar algunos árboles para realizar la siembra de café, aumentando su producción lo que es muy beneficioso tanto para José como para el mejoramiento de toda su familia.
texts.en: José is 48 years old. He lives with his wife and two children, for whom he works very hard to give them the best life possible. José works in different activities, such as running his little store where he sells perishable products. With his wife, he also prepares food and sells it at factories to the workers. He also works as a farmer growing coffee. With all of this, he shows how much he wants to have a better life and get ahead. José is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to buy a chainsaw so he can cut some trees to plant coffee. This will increase his production which is beneficial both for Jose and all of his family.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw to improve his land parcel in order to plant.

loans.name: Cristino Eduardo

texts.es: Cristino Eduardo de  40 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Él se dedica junto a su padre al cultivo de los principales granos básicos y a la crianza de ganado desde hace muchos años,  las cuales realiza año con año para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Estas actividades son las que le permiten  cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar y Cristino las realiza con gran empeño y dedicación. Él es un hombre trabajador,  honrado y responsable vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y esta es la razón que le motiva a trabajar duramente para dar lo mejor a su familia ya que es la única forma  de poder cambiar la realidad en la que se encuentran. Cristino sabe que con un poco de ayuda para invertir en sus cultivos y en la crianza de su ganado podrá generar más ingresos los cuales le ayudaran a cambiar el futuro de su familia, es por estas razones que se acercó a INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito el cual solicita para invertir en la compra de ganado y de insumos para sus cosechas como pesticidas, abono, semillas, etc. ya que son sus dos únicas fuentes de ingresos y espera que estas cosechas sean mejores que los años anteriores para tener buenos ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Cristino Eduardo is 40 years old. He lives in a home he owns with his wife and children. With his father, he has grown basic grains and raised cattle for many years. He does these things year after year to earn the daily bread for his home. These activities are what allows him to cover the basic necessities in his home and Cristino does them with much hard work and dedication. He is a hardworking, honest and responsible  man. He lives in very humble conditions together with his family and that is what motivates him to work hard to give his family the best. That is the only way to change the reality they find themselves in. Cristino knows that with a little help to invest in his crops and in the cattle raising, he will be able to generate more income, which will help him change his family's future. That is why he approached INTEGRAL, to ask for a loan to invest in buying cattle and materials for his crops, such as pesticides, fertilizer, seeds, etc. These are his only sources of income and he hopes that these crops will be better than in previous years so he can have good income for his family.

loans.use: to buy cattle and materials for his crops, such as pesticides, fertilizer, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Elsa Iraheta

texts.es: Elsa de 58 años de edad,  es una señora muy dedicada a su hogar, la cual posee su propio negocio gracias al cual cuenta con todo lo necesario para vivir. Ella Vive junto a tres hijos, siendo madre soltera, lo que provoca que Elsa deba esforzarse el doble para salir adelante junto a su familia. Elsa  posee una tienda de productos comestibles como pan y golosinas, y también   de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo,  negocio el cual se encuentra en su casa de habitación. Elsa  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda, así mismo para comprar mayor cantidad de maíz,  verduras, golosinas, quesos pan y otros productos más de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar, convirtiéndose en un gran ejemplo para otras personas debido a sus grandes deseos de superación.
texts.en: Elsa is 58 years old. She is a woman who is very dedicated to her home. She owns her own business and thanks to it, she has everything she needs to live. She lives with her three children and is a single mother. This makes Elsa have to work twice as hard to get ahead with her family. Elsa  has a store where she sells food products such as bread and snacks as well as soap and shampoo. The business is in her house. She is asking for a loan to stock up her store even more and to buy a larger quantity of rice, vegetables, snacks, cheeses, bread,  and other products so she can serve her customers better and improve her sales to get her family ahead. She also want to become a great example for other people due to her great wish to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталья вместе со своим мужем занимаются выращиванием ранних овощей в теплицах. Они выращивают помидоры, огурцы, редис, перец, кабачки. В прошлом году Наталья приобрела дополнительный участок земли и построила там еще одну теплицу. Кредит нужен для закупки пленки, а также семян и удобрений.
 
За прошедший год в семье Натали случилось два несчастся - она поломала ногу и внук попал в аварию (сбила машина). На лечение ушло много денег, но теперь все позади и все здоровы. 

У Натальи и ее мужа большие планы по развитию - хотят строить новые теплицы, чтобы выращивать еще больше овощей.
texts.en:
Natalya and her husband cultivate early vegetables in greenhouses. They grow tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, peppers and squash. Last year, Natalya purchased an additional plot of land and built a new greenhouse. Now she needs a loan to buy plastic greenhouse covering, as well as seeds and fertilizers.

Last year, Natalya's family suffered two misfortunes: she broke her leg, and her grandson was hit by a car. Medical treatment cost a lot of money, but now everyone is healthy and those events are behind them. Natalya and her husband have big plans for development of their business: they would like to construct additional greenhouses and grow even more vegetables.

loans.use: to buy plastic greenhouse covering, seeds, and fertilizers

loans.name: Pavlo

texts.ru:
Павло женат, имеет одного ребенка. Вот уже 6 лет, как он работает автомехаником. По началу ему просто нравилось ремонтировать машины. Затем к нему стало обращаться все больше людей. Так постепенно образовалась своя клиентская база. Павел обзавелся собственным гаражем и постепенно его хобби переросло в доходный бизнес.
Павел хочет расширять спект услуг по ремонту машин и просит предоставить ему кредит для покупки оборудования для автоматического шиномонтажа. Это позволит Павлу обслуживать еще больше клиентов и увеличить доход для своей семьи. Павел мечтает, чтобы у него появился сын, которому он сможет передать все свои умения по ремонту машин.

Примечание: на фото Павло со своей женой и дочкой.
texts.en:
Pavlo is married and has a child. For the past 6 years, he has been working as a car mechanic. In the beginning, he simply enjoyed repairing cars, but then more and more people started to turn to him for service. In this way, he gradually built up a customer base. Pavlo opened his own repair shop, and gradually turned his hobby into a profitable business.

Pavlo would like to expand the range of autoservices in his shop and is requesting a loan to purchase equipment for automatic tire mounting.  This will allow Pavlo to service even more customers and increase his family's income. Pavlo dreams of having a son to whom he will transfer all his knowledge of car repair. (The photo shows Pavlo with his wife and daughter.)

loans.use: to buy equipment for mounting tires

loans.name: Toribia

texts.es: Toribia de 64 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida y deliciosos tamales. Su negocio está ubicado en su hogar de habitación, lugar que es muy visitado especialmente porque sus tamales y comida son de muy buena calidad, Toribia es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de sacar a sus hijos adelante para darles una buena educación y mejorar su calidad de vida. Trabaja muy duro para poder mantener activo su negocio y para seguir dando a sus clientes productos y alimentos de excelente calidad, ya que este es su principal y única fuente de ingresos. Ella tiene el deseo de incrementar sus ingresos y la única forma de hacerlo es invirtiendo en su negocio con la compra de maíz, leña, bebidas, etc. que le ayudaran a elaborar e incrementar el menú de comidas de su establecimiento, por estas razones es que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar el crédito que le ayude a invertir y seguir concretando su sueño de hacer crecer su negocio y el de darle un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en: Toribia is 64 years of age and lives in her own house along with her children.  She prepares and sells food and delicious tamales.  Her business is located in her home and is particularly well frequented because of the high quality of her tamales and the other food she sells.  Toribia is a hardworking and enterprising woman whose great ambition is to support her children, give them a good education and improve their quality of life.  She works very hard to keep her business afloat and to continue providing excellent quality goods and foodstuffs for her customers, since this is her main and sole source of income.  She wants to increase her income and the only way to do so is by investing in her business with the purchase of corn, wood, drinks, etc. which will help her to create and increase the menu of dishes on offer in her premises.  It is for this reason that she approached INTEGRAL to apply for a loan to enable her to invest and continue realising her dreams of expanding her business and giving her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Umoja Virunga Group

texts.fr: La cliente Chiza, leader du groupe d’affaire « Umoja Virunga », est entrepreneur, âgée de 50 ans, mariée, mère de 6 enfants qui étudient tous et d’autres ont leurs propres foyers. Elle est vendeuse de friperie. Son mari est un ingénieur constructeur. Elle installe ses marchandises au marché central Virunga. Il y a 17 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces activités. Elle commença son business avec ses fonds propres reçus de son mari. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 2 ballons de friperies. En plus, elle ambitionne scolariser ses enfants et le nourrir. La cliente remercie Hekima pour ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique
texts.en: Chiza, leader of the business group « Umoja Virunga », is an 50 year old entrepreneur, a married womand, and the mother of six children currently attending school and others who have their own homes. She sells used clothing, and her husband is a structural engineer. She has been selling her clothing at the central market in Virunga for the past 17 years. She began this business with funds received from her husband. She is asking for a loan in order to stock up with two bags of used clothing. She hopes to continue taking care of the nutrition and schooling fees for her chidren. Chiza would like to tahnk Hekima for supporting poor women currently excluded from the classic banking system.

loans.use: purchase two bags of used clothing

loans.name: Mutambara Group

texts.fr:
Antoine fait partie du groupe  Mutambara et  habite à Rumonge. Il  a  35 ans et est marié à Espérance, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants, âgés de 5 à  9 ans, dont 2 étudient.
Il  a sous sa charge un orphelin.
Il  fait le commerce de bananes, d’ananas, de bananes mûres, depuis 10 ans. 

Il est à son deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de bananes, d’ananas et  de bananes mûres à  revendre, pour gagner plus.

Avec les gains de son commerce, il assure la ration alimentaire et habille la famille. Dans les prochaines  années,  il  voudrait faire l’agriculture et louer les palmiers à  huile pour vendre  les  fruits du palmier à huile et  constituer l’épargne de ses enfants. Il  voudrait en outre voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en: Antoine is a member of the Mutambara group and lives in Rumonge. He is 35 years old and married to Espérance, a storekeeper. They have three children aged between 5 and 9 years old, 2 of whom attend school. They are also responsible for an orphan. For the past 10 years, Antoine has been selling bananas and pineapples. He is asking for his second loan from Turame, in order to increase his capital and purchase large quantities of bananes and pineapples. He uses the profits from his activity to ensure the food needs of his family. In the coming years, he hopes to foray into agriculture by renting out his palm trees that produce oil, in order to sell the fruits of these trees and begin to save for his children. He would also like to see his children attend school.

loans.use: increase his capital and purchase large quantities of bananas and pineapples to re-sell

loans.name: Ana Yensi

texts.es: Ana de 27 años de edad, es muy emprendedora y responsable quien  vive junto a su madre de 67 años de edad quien trabaja como costurera. Ana se dedica a atender un agroservicio en el que se comercializa medicinas, comida para animales, pesticidas, abonos y semillas para sembrar entre otros productos, y es como de esta forma Ana y su madre trabajan arduamente para salir adelante y entre ambas sostener su hogar. A pesar de sus grandes esfuerzos, Ana no ha podido solventar una necesidad fundamental, la cual es mejorar las condiciones de su hogar, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda cambiar el techo dañado y el piso de su casa, ya que en inviernos pasados han sufrido de muchas goteras e inundaciones, lo que hace incomodo estar en su propio hogar. Ana desea tener una casa segura tanto para ella como para su madre y vivir tranquilamente.
texts.en:
Ana is 27 years old, and is very enterprising and responsible. She lives with her mother, who is 67 years old and works as a seamstress.

Ana makes a living serving customers at an agricultural service center selling medicine, animal feed, fertilizer, compost and seeds for planting among other products. In this way, Ana and her mother work hard to move forward and, between them, maintain their home. 

Despite her huge efforts, Ana has not managed to meet the basic need of improving living conditions in their home, and this is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. With this loan, she can replace the damaged roof and floor of her house. In past winters, they have suffered many leaks and flooding, which make it uncomfortable for them to be in their own home. Ana wants a safe house for her and her mother, and to live in peace.

loans.use: to invest in making home improvements.

loans.name: Jullieta

texts.en: Julieta is from Guba, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 63 years old, married and has 5 children. Julieta owns and operates a vegetable farming business. She has been engaged in her business for 8 years and earns 9,000 PHP a month from it. In 2010, Julieta joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 19,500 PHP which she will use to purchase fertilizer and seedlings to plant. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings to plant.

loans.name: Yanci Emperatriz

texts.es: Yanci Emperatriz de veintiuno años de edad junto a su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños además para complementar los gastos del hogar vende productos por catalogo, vende de forma ambulante y desde su vivienda ya tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad de la ropa, los buenos precios y además por el excelente servicio; Yanci es una mujer activa, dedicada a su labor, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que solo así lograra su objetivo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, perfumes, cosméticos, etc. Yanci Emperatriz tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yanci Emperatriz is 21 years old, and she lives with her life partner.  She sells clothing for women, men, and children.  In order to supplement the household expenses, she also sells products by catalog.  She sells in an itinerant manner and from her home.  She has had the business for several years.  It has gifted her with a lot of sales experience, which allows her to get better income.  

She is very well-known.  She has a lot of customers who prefer her for the quality of the clothes, the good prices, and the excellent service.  Yanci is a very active woman who is dedicated to her work, and she has a great desire to get ahead.  She is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will allow her to achieve success.  She puts forth maximum effort every day because she knows that this is the only way she will achieve her objective. 

In recent weeks the demand has increased.  She wants to take advantage of this by making a new investment.  She needs capital, and that is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy clothes wholesale, perfume, and cosmetics, etc.  Yanci Empaatriz has good payment references and she is responsible.  She assures that she will  be able to repay the loan. At the same time, she has faith that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale, perfume, and cosmetics, etc

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 41 years old and married with five children. He lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. For the past 10 years, Mario has owned a motorcycle transport business and he earns 3,000 PHP each month. He joined GDMPC in 2010. 

Mario is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan to repair a transport vehicle he uses in his business. He plans to use the profit from his loan to purchase an additional motorcycle.

loans.use: to repair a vehicle used in his business

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is 45 years old and married with two children. She lives in Tangub City. For the past 15 years, Sally has operated a motorcycle transport business and she earns a monthly income of 5,000 PHP. She joined GDMPC in 2010.

Sally is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan to buy chicken to fry and sell to the local community from a food stall. She plans to use the profit from her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken to fry and sell

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.en: To earn his living, Aurelio raises livestock, especially pigs, to sell. He decided to establish his business in order to generate income instead of just lazing at home and doing household chores. He is 53 years old and he has three children. He would like to expand his business, but he has insufficient funds. Therefore he is asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy vitamins, vaccines, and feed for the sustenance and proper growth of his hogs. He hopes this loan will be granted as it is his only chance to improve his business and his family's lives as well.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, vaccines, and feed for his hogs.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto, es una persona trabajadora y responsable, vive junto a su esposa quien elabora tamales para vender y así mismo junto a su pequeña nieta quien depende de ellos por completo. Roberto trabaja vendiendo leña que comercializa en su casa de habitación y así también de forma ambulante, lo cual es un trabajo muy duro ya que debe transportar la leña el mismo, este es un negocio bastante estable el cual le ha permitido salir adelante, criar a sus hijos, sostener su hogar y ahora a su nieta, por lo que desea mejorarlo grandemente. Roberto solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de leña, y de esta forma atender a más clientes, lo cual le deje más ingresos, lo que es muy beneficioso para su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto is a hard-working and responsible person.  He lives with his wife; she makes tamales to sell.  He also lives with his little granddaughter, who is completely dependent upon them.

Roberto works selling firewood at his house and in an itinerant manner.  This is very hard work because he needs to transport the firewood himself.  This is a quite stable business, which has allowed him to get ahead, raise his children, support his household and now his granddaughter.  

He wishes to greatly improve the business.  Roberto is requesting a loan from Integral to invest in buying greater quantities of firewood.  This way he will tend to more customers, which leaves him with more income.  This is very helpful for his family.

loans.use: to buy firewood to sell.

loans.name: Emerson Alexis

texts.es: Emerson es un joven responsable quien ve por el bienestar de su familia, a sus 29 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos pequeños hijos quienes son la mayor inspiración la cual le permite salir adelante y anhelar una vida mejor. Emerson trabaja en su propio taller electrónico en el que se dedica a reparar televisores, ventiladores, radios, controles remoto, entre otros aparatos más, él ya cuenta con más de dos años de poseer ente negocio en el centro del departamento en que reside y cuenta con muchos clientes quienes lo prefieren por ser responsable, amable y honrado. Emerson solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar diferentes repuestos como integrados, chips, cables, y otros más para reparar mayor cantidad de electrodomésticos. El mayor deseo de Emerson es crecer aún más en el negocio para contar con más ganancias.
texts.en:
Emerson is a responsible young man who takes care of his family's wellbeing. He is 29 years old and lives with his wife and their two small children, who are his biggest inspiration, helping him to move forward and seek a better life. 

Emerson works in his own electronics workshop, in which he makes a living repairing televisions, fans, radios, remote controls and other equipment. He has owned this business for over two years already, in the center of the department where he lives. He has many customers, who favor him because he is reliable, friendly and honest.

Emerson is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy various spare parts, such as integrated circuits, chips, cables, and other items to repair a greater number of household appliances. 

Emerson's greatest wish is to grow his business even further, in order to increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair household appliances.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is 33 and married with two children. She lives Ozamiz City. For the past 8 years, Margie has managed a banana production business and she earns 3,000 PHP each month. She joined GDMPC in 2012. 

Margie is requesting a 3,500 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans used the profit generated with her loan to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her husband's motorbike business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 38 years old, a married lady and the mother of five children, ages nine to four. She buys maize in wholesale from farmers, and sells to her customers, with a monthly income of KES. 50,000.

She has applied for her first loan of KES. 20,000 from KADET LTD, which she will use to pay for maize transport.  She plans to use the anticipated profit to enlarge her warehouse.

Her hopes and dreams are to educate her children, and to improve her financial stability.

loans.use: to pay for maize transport.

loans.name: Isabel Esperanza

texts.es: Isabel de 30 años de edad, vive junto a sus tres hijos menores de edad y junto a su esposo quien se esfuerza mucho para poder llevar en sustento diario a su casa. Como toda madre responsable, quien ha debido trabajar muy duro junto a su esposo, se dedica a la venta de ropa para hombres, mujeres y niños, la cual comercializa sobre calle principal del lugar en el que reside, siendo un lugar de mucho comercio, Isabel vende la ropa a muy buenos precios, así mismo es una persona muy amable y positiva, razón por la que cuenta con varios clientes. Ella solicita un préstamo con el deseo de poder contar con el monto necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir, con lo que espera obtener mayores ganancias, las cuales sean de gran beneficio para sus hijos como también para su hogar.
texts.en:
Isabel, age 30, lives with her three minor children and her husband.  He puts forth great effort in order to be able to bring home the daily bread.  Like all responsible mothers who have had to work very hard together with their husbands, she sells clothes for men, women, and children.  She sells on the main street in the place where she lives as this is a place with a lot of commerce.

Isabel sells clothes for very good prices.  She is a very kind and positive person, which is why she has a lot of customers.  She is requesting a loan in order to be able to have the money needed to buy a greater quantity of clothing.  By doing so she hopes to get greater income.  The income would be a big help for her children and her home.

loans.use: to buy clothes to increase her inventory.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 42 years old and married with five children. Two of her children are already married. For the past 20 years, Teresa has owned and operated a food vending business where she sells frozen foods, fish, and meat products. She also sells snacks in the mornings and afternoons in her village. Her annual income is 12,000 PHP. Teresa's husband currently works buying and selling hogs. 

Teresa is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan to purchase food products to sell. She will use the profit from her loan for the education of her children and to provide for her family's daily expenditures.

loans.use: to purchase food products to sell

loans.name: Ritchel

texts.en:
Ritchel is 34 years old and married with three children. She lives in Tangub City, Philippines. For the past 10 years, Ritchel has owned a plot of farmland where she cultivates bananas to earn a living. She earns 7,000 PHP each month. Ritchel has been a member of the Kiva partner GDMPC for three years.

Ritchel is requesting a 15,500 PHP loan to purchase farm chemicals. In the future, she hopes to save her profits to buy more land.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals for her farm

loans.name: Nyamzav

texts.en:
Mr.Nyamzav, 39 years old, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. His wife works as a dressmaker at a cashmere business. He has been working as a bus driver since 2006. 

Building of the family's home began two years ago, with the help of Kiva lenders. This time, Nyamzav wants to purchase some necessary home furniture such as a chair, a table and a chest of drawers. He is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to purchase these items. 

As a result, the family can live in a comfortable place, and will work more enthusiastically. The borrower is a very hardworking and reliable individual who strives for better life.

loans.use: To purchase home furniture.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is a 30-year old resident of Montol, Ozamis City. She helps provide for her family's needs from the little amount of 4,000 PHP she has gained monthly from her gardening business for 15 years. However, since 2010 she's been a member of GDMPC, and she is now applying for an 8,000 PHP loan from GDMPC microfinance to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Judith wants to make an improvements to her house, and maybe complete an entire renovation one day.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Louel

texts.en: Louel lives in Gata Daku, Clarin. He has earned his living by providing transportation services for 3 years; with this money, he provides for the needs of his child. He gets an income of 4,000 PHP a month from this business. For a 29-year old father, there’s nothing more that can make him happy except to see his child successful in its studies. Without hesitation, Louel is borrowing 10,000 PHP from GDMPC microcredit to repair his transport vehicle for his business. He joined GDMPC in 2010. His plan in the future is to hopefully improve his business.

loans.use: to repair his transport vehicle for his business.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is 29 years old, and still single. He has been engaged in a hog-raising business for two years, and earns approximately PHP 8,000 every four months. He says that the most tiresome part is to clean the piggery every day. 

He wants to provide the necessities needed for his pigs, therefore he is requesting a loan of P10,000 to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for his pigs. 

He hopes this will make them fit and nourished to provide higher sales at selling time; he hopes to grow his business to secure his family living.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for his pigs.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 36 years old and married to Janet. The couple supports a family of seven. For the past six years, Patrick has operated a welding business in the Bomet area and he earns a monthly income of 51,000 KES. 

Patrick is requesting a 35,000 KES loan from KADET LTD to add to his savings and purchase a bigger welding machine. This will be his second loan. Patrick plans to use the anticipated profit from his loan to expand his business. He also hopes to provide for his family's basic needs, become financially stable, and educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase a welding machine

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa, dos hijos y su madre de avanzada edad y quien depende por completo de él. Carlos es una persona responsable y trabajadora que se dedica a transportar personas en su pequeño camión y así mismo a transportar muebles y realizar trabajo de mudanza para quienes solicite sus servicios. Con el fin de brindar un mejor servicio, él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual cuente con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de llantas para su camión y así mismo realizarle otros arreglos, para Carlos la seguridad de sus clientes es muy importante, razón por la que también cuenta con muchos clientes ya que es muy conocido por esto. Brindar servicio de transporte es la forma en que Carlos lleva el sustento a su hogar por lo que es imprescindible mejorar su servicio constantemente y así tener un negocio fijo.
texts.en:
Carlos, 32 years old, lives together with his wife, two children and his elderly mother who depends completely on him.  Carlos is a responsible and hardworking person who makes a living transporting people in his small truck as well as transporting furniture and performing moving jobs for those who seek his services.  

With the goal of providing a better service, he is requesting a loan from Integral, with which he will have the necessary money to invest in the purchase of tires for his truck and also carry out other repairs.  The safety of his customers is very important for Carlos, for this reason he also has many clients since he is well-known for this.  Providing transport service is the way in which Carlos brings sustenance to his home so it is essential to constantly improve his service and thus have a steady business.

loans.use: to buy tires for truck maintenance.

loans.name: Jennefer

texts.en: Jennefer is a 27-year-old living in Gata Daku, Clarin. She has provided for the needs of her child from the small sum of 6,000 PHP per month that she has been earning for 4 years from her corn production business. Her business is an aid to the income that her husband earns from painting. In 2011, Jennefer joined GDMPC, and she is applying for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy fertilizer. She wants to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 35 years old and married with three children. For the past six years, she has been a dairy farmer and she also raises chickens. She relies on her husband's income and she also owns some rental houses. Mary used her previous loan to buy a dairy cow. Her business did well and she successfully repaid her loan. Mary is very hardworking and Faulu Kenya has helped her to increase her profits. 

Mary is requesting a 63,585 KES loan to buy chicks to raise. In the future, she hopes to buy a van and become the main supplier of eggs in her area.

loans.use: to buy chicks

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 48 years old and married with three children, all of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them. For the past 12 years, Estela has operated a retail business. She is thankful for the income she has generated through her work as it has been a great help for her children's education. Estela's major business challenge is the lack of adequate capital. 

Estela is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through ASKI to purchase more fish, vegetables, and vinegar to sell in the market. She knows that with her loan and her hard work, she can increase her profit to make her business successful and continue to provide for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fish, vegetables, and vinegar to sell

loans.name: Jonald

texts.en: Jonald is a responsible husband. He is 28 years old. He raises hogs and sells them for a profit. He wants to have more hogs to raise, and this is why he is borrowing 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy vaccines, feed and medicine to sustain his hogs. Aside from raising hogs, he also raises chickens and will buy feed for them, too. With hard work and the help of his wife, he hopes to achieve economic stability someday.

loans.use: to buy vaccines, feed and medicine to sustain his hogs.

loans.name: Kyen

texts.en:
Kyen is married with five children. She lives in Nchuobu Junction, Bamenda, Cameroon.
  
She has had to overcome some challenges in life, such as ill health and the difficulties she faces paying her children's school fees. She does trading to earn a living.

This will be her second time to receive a loan from GHAPE. She has been a member since 2011. She has been quite successful in the past with her business due to the location of her business and her reasonable prices. With her increased experience, she is now having good profit from her business.
 
With this loan, she plans to buy plantains, yams and cocoyams and pay for transportation to and from the bush market. She thinks her business will succeed because she has already mastered the business, because she is located at a junction where so many people pass through and also because she has many customers.
 
Part of her profits from this loan will be used to take care of her children, buy necessities for the family and give them good medication whenever they are sick. She will plow part back into her farm.

loans.use: to buy plantains, yams and cocoyams.

loans.name: Glenard

texts.en:
Glenard is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 3 children. 

Glenard has a tricycle that he operates everyday as a source of income. He has had this business for over 2 years. He requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to pay for new tires and motorcycle maintenance. In the future, Glenard hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to pay for new tires and motorcycle maintenance.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is a married lady, age 35. She is blessed with two children, ages 14 and 2. She operates a clothing boutique shop in Narok town area and has been running the business for two years. She earns a monthly income of 20,000 KES.

She is applying for her first loan of 30,000 KES from KADET LTD, which she intends to use to purchase more clothing for the business. 

The anticipated profit will be used to pay school fees for her school-going children. Her dream is to improve her living standard and own a residential plot.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing for resale

loans.name: Celestina

texts.en: Celestina is 49 years old and is from Calaran, Calamba. She is married and blessed with 3 children. Celestina is working as chief baker to help the family to earn for a living. She has been in this business for 5 years and earns about 10,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) per month. In 2012, Celestina joined GDMPC. She requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to purchase new baking equipment & tools to expand the business. Celestina plans to invest the income generated from her loan in the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase new baking equipment & tools to expand the business.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is 30 years old and is married with one child. She lives in the town of Kisekende in the Mubende region of Uganda. For the past five years, Margret has been working hard to manage her small shop where she sells plastic household items. 

Margret is requesting a 2,000,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to buy more plastic items to sell. Her loan will help her to generate greater profits and improve her family's standards of living. Margret hopes that in the future she will be able to construct over 10 rental houses to provide 100,000 UGX each month. 

Margret is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Margret who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy plastic items to sell

loans.name: Allen

texts.en:
Allen, 43 years old, is a single entrepreneur from Magcamiguing, Calamba. He is earning from his transport service business. It started almost two years ago, and he now earns 6,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) a month. 

To improve business, Allen is borrowing the amount of 20,000 PHP from GDMPC microcredit, which he just joined recently, to obtain accessories and tires. Before long, he’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding his business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires.

loans.name: Adamu

texts.en:
Born in 1947, Adamu is married and has seven children. They live in a six-room apartment in Alachu Mankon Bamenda, Cameroon. 

Adamu has been facing diificulties in life which has hindered his raising enough capital to carry out a lucrative business. The greatest challenge he had in life was the fact that his father died when he was very young and did not give him a good education. 

He joined Grounded and Holistic Approach for People's Empowerment (GHAPE) in 2011. Since then, he has received and repaid one loan.

With this new loan, Adamu plans to buy wood for the construction of a pig fence, buy bags of pig feed, piglets, and also to buy feeders. He says his activity will succeed because he has obtained some training on pig farming, he knows where to buy a good breed of piglets, and because he has a piece of land where he will construct his pig fence.

Adamu says he will use part of his profit to pay school fees for his children and also to take care of the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to purchase wood for construction of a pig fence, pig feed, and piglets for a pig farm.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en: Clara is a 61-year-old married woman, a mother of a 15-year-old daughter, and is from Ubay, Bohol. She has run a sari-sari (variety store) business for more than 16 years now. This is the source of her income. Clara is asking for a loan to buy additional stock to sell like canned goods, candies, snack foods, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries. With this, she will be able to cater and sell more to her buyers thus augmenting her sales and income. Clara hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell like canned goods, candies, snack foods, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza, 48, has hopes of success in the near future. But for now, she is working so hard for the opportunity to experience a better living. 

She is selling “ukay-ukay” (second-hand clothing) in the village, which is providing her daily expenses for living. She wants to purchase more clothes, but insufficient capital hinders her. This causes Flordeliza to requests a loan of 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy shorts, blouses and t-shirts. 

Flordeliza hopes for the development of her income this time in order to experience soon the prosperity of life.

loans.use: to buy shorts, blouses and t-shirts.

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda is married and has three children. She is 46 years old and lives in Sibutad, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. 

Luzminda owns and operates a plot of farmland, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for four years and earns PHP 7,000 each month. 

She requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Luzminda has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. Luzminda aims to expand her business to have a better income.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Florecitas Group

texts.es:
